Washington_NP ,_, Feb._NP 9_CD --_-- President_NN Kennedy_NP today_NR proposed_VBD a_AT mammoth_JJ new_JJ medical_JJ care_NN program_NN whereby_WRB social_JJ security_NN taxes_NNS on_IN 70_CD million_CD American_JJ workers_NNS would_MD be_BE raised_VBN to_TO pay_VB the_AT hospital_NN and_CC some_DTI other_AP medical_JJ bills_NNS of_IN 14.2_AT million_CD Americans_NPS over_IN 65_CD who_WPS are_BER covered_VBN by_IN social_JJ security_NN or_CC railroad_NN retirement_NN programs_NNS ._. The_AT President_NN ,_, in_IN a_AT special_JJ message_NN to_IN Congress_NP ,_, tied_VBD in_RP with_IN his_PP$ aged_VBN care_NN plan_VB requests_NNS for_IN large_JJ federal_JJ grants_NNS to_TO finance_VB medical_JJ and_CC dental_JJ scholarships_NNS ,_, build_VB 20_CD new_JJ medical_JJ and_CC 20_CD new_JJ dental_JJ schools_NNS ,_, and_CC expand_VB child_NN health_NN care_VB and_CC general_JJ medical_JJ research_NN ._. The_AT aged_VBN care_NN plan_NN ,_, similar_JJ to_IN one_CD the_AT President_NN sponsored_VBN last_AP year_NN as_CS a_AT senator_NN ,_, a_AT fight_NN on_IN Capitol_NN hill_NN ._. It_PPS was_BEDZ defeated_VBN in_IN Congress_NP last_AP year_NN ._. Cost_NN up_RP to_TO $37_VB a_AT year_NN It_PPS would_MD be_BE financed_VBN by_IN boosting_VBG the_AT social_JJ security_NN payroll_NN tax_NN by_IN as_QL much_AP as_CS $37_IN a_AT year_NN for_IN each_DT of_IN the_AT workers_NNS now_RB paying_VBG such_JJ taxes_NNS ._. The_AT social_JJ security_NN payroll_NN tax_NN is_BEZ now_RB 6_CD per_IN cent_NN --_-- 3_CD per_IN cent_NN on_IN each_DT worker_NN and_CC employer_NN --_-- on_IN the_AT first_OD $4,800_NN of_IN pay_NN per_IN year_NN ._. The_AT Kennedy_NP plan_NN alone_RB would_MD boost_VB the_AT base_NN to_IN $5,000_NNS a_AT year_NN and_CC the_AT payroll_NN tax_NN to_TO 6.5_VB per_IN cent_NN --_-- 3.25_RB per_IN cent_NN each_DT ._. Similar_JJ payroll_NN tax_NN boosts_NN would_MD be_BE imposed_VBN on_IN those_DTS under_IN the_AT railroad_NN retirement_NN system_NN ._. The_AT payroll_NN tax_NN would_MD actually_RB rise_VB to_IN 7.5_CD per_IN cent_NN starting_VBG Jan._NP 1_CD ,_, 1963_CD ,_, if_CS the_AT plan_NN is_BEZ approved_VBN ,_, because_CS the_AT levy_NN is_BEZ already_RB scheduled_VBN to_TO go_VB up_RP by_IN 1_CD per_IN cent_NN on_IN that_DT date_NN to_TO pay_VB for_IN other_AP social_JJ security_NN costs_VBZ ._. Outlays_PPS would_MD increase_VB Officials_NNS estimated_VBN the_AT annual_JJ tax_NN boost_NN for_IN the_AT medical_JJ plan_NN would_MD amount_VB to_IN 1.5_CD billion_CD dollars_NNS and_CC that_CS medical_JJ benefits_NNS paid_VBD out_RP would_MD run_VB 1_CD billion_CD or_CC more_AP in_IN the_AT first_OD year_NN ,_, 1963_CD ._. Both_ABX figures_NNS would_MD go_VB higher_JJR in_IN later_JJR years_NNS ._. These_DTS would_MD be_BE paid_VBN for_IN out_RP of_IN general_JJ ,_, not_* payroll_NN ,_, taxes_NNS ._. Nursing_VBG home_NR care_VB The_AT aged_VBN care_NN plan_NN carries_VBZ these_DTS benefits_NNS for_IN persons_NNS over_IN 65_CD who_WPS are_BER under_IN the_AT social_JJ security_NN and_CC railroad_NN retirement_NN systems_NNS :_. 1_CD Full_JJ payment_NN of_IN hospital_NN bills_NNS for_IN stays_VBZ up_RP to_TO 90_CD days_NNS for_IN each_DT illness_NN ,_, except_IN that_CS the_AT patient_NN would_MD pay_VB $10_NNS a_AT day_NN of_IN the_AT cost_VBN for_IN the_AT first_OD nine_CD days_NNS ._. 2_CD Full_JJ payment_NN of_IN nursing_VBG home_NN bills_NNS for_IN up_RP to_IN 180_CD days_NNS following_IN discharge_NN from_IN a_AT hospital_NN ._. A_AT patient_NN could_MD receive_VB up_RP to_IN 300_CD days_NNS paid-for_IN nursing_VBG home_NR care_NN under_IN a_AT ``_`` unit_NN formula_NN ''_'' allowing_VBG more_AP of_IN such_JJ care_NN for_IN those_DTS who_WPS use_VB none_PN or_CC only_RB part_NN of_IN the_AT hospital-care_JJ credit_NN ._. 3_CD Hospital_NN outpatient_IN clinic_NN diagnostic_JJ service_NN for_IN all_ABN costs_NNS in_IN excess_NN of_IN $20_NNS a_IN patient_NN ._. 4_CD Community_NN visiting_VBG nurse_NN services_NNS at_IN home_NN for_IN up_RP to_IN 240_CD days_NNS an_AT illness_NN ._. Contributions_RB to_IN schools_NNS The_AT scholarship_NN plan_NN would_MD provide_VB federal_JJ contributions_NNS to_IN each_DT medical_JJ and_CC dental_JJ school_NN equal_JJ to_IN $1,500_NNS a_AT year_NN for_IN one-fourth_NN of_IN the_AT first_OD year_NN students_NNS ._. Mr._NP Notte_NP was_BEDZ responding_VBG to_IN a_AT resolution_NN adopted_VBN by_IN the_AT Central_JJ Falls_NNS City_NN Council_NN on_IN July_NP 10_CD and_CC sent_VBN to_IN the_AT state_NN house_NN by_IN Miss_NP Grant_NN ._. The_AT resolution_NN urges_VBZ the_AT governor_NN to_TO have_HV a_AT complete_JJ study_NN of_IN the_AT Sunday_NR sales_NNS laws_NNS made_VBN with_IN an_AT eye_NN to_IN their_PP$ revision_NN at_IN the_AT next_AP session_NN of_IN the_AT legislature_NN ._. The_AT governor_NN wrote_VBD Miss_NP Grant_NP that_CS he_PPS has_HVZ been_BEN concerned_VBN for_IN some_DTI time_NN ``_`` with_IN the_AT continuous_JJ problem_NN which_WDT confronts_VBZ our_PP$ local_JJ and_CC state_NN law_NN enforcement_NN officers_NNS as_CS a_AT result_NN of_IN the_AT laws_NNS regulating_IN Sunday_NR sales_NNS ''_'' ._. The_AT Central_JJ Falls_NNS City_NN Council_NN expressed_VBN concern_NN especially_RB that_CS more_AP foods_NNS be_BE placed_VBN on_IN the_AT eligible_JJ list_NN and_CC that_DT neighborhood_NN grocery_NN and_CC variety_NN stores_NNS be_BE allowed_VBN to_TO do_DO business_NN on_IN Sunday_NR ._. This_DT had_HVD never_RB been_BEN done_VBN before_CS ._. First_RB ,_, the_AT general_JJ stock_NN market_NN has_HVZ been_BEN boiling_VBG upward_RB for_IN the_AT last_AP few_AP months_NNS ,_, driving_VBG stocks_NNS of_IN all_ABN kinds_NNS up_RP ._. '_' not_* flash_VB in_IN pan_NN '_' Sprinkel_PPSS told_VBD conferees_NNS that_CS the_AT recent_JJ improvement_NN in_IN economic_JJ activity_NN was_BEDZ not_* a_AT ``_`` temporary_JJ flash_NN in_IN the_AT pan_NN ''_'' but_CC the_AT beginning_NN of_IN a_AT substantial_JJ cyclical_NN expansion_NN that_WPS will_MD carry_VB the_AT economy_NN back_RB to_IN full_JJ employment_NN levels_NNS and_CC witness_VB a_AT renewal_NN of_IN our_PP$ traditional_JJ growth_NN pattern_NN ._. ``_`` In_IN view_NN of_IN the_AT current_JJ expansion_NN ,_, which_WDT promises_VBZ to_TO be_BE substantial_JJ ''_'' he_PPS said_VBD the_AT odds_NNS appear_VB to_TO favor_VB rising_VBG interest_NN rates_NNS in_IN coming_VBG months_NNS ,_, but_CC ``_`` there_EX is_BEZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB the_AT change_NN will_MD not_* be_BE as_QL abrupt_JJ as_CS in_IN 1958_CD nor_CC as_QL severe_JJ as_CS in_IN late_JJ 1959_CD and_CC 1960_CD ''_'' ._. In_IN Laos_NP ,_, the_AT picture_NN was_BEDZ almost_QL equally_QL bad_JJ ._. Much_AP has_HVZ been_BEN made_VBN of_IN the_AT fact_NN that_CS major_JJ Catholic_JJ institutions_NNS now_RB guarantee_VB firm_JJ tenure_NN ._. This_DT is_BEZ a_AT significant_JJ advance_NN but_CC its_PP$ import_NN should_MD not_* be_BE exaggerated_VBN ._. When_WRB a_AT man_NN invests_IN a_AT block_NN of_IN his_PP$ years_NNS at_IN a_AT university_NN without_IN gaining_VBG the_AT coveted_VBN promotion_NN ,_, not_* only_RB is_BEZ he_PPS faced_VBD with_IN the_AT problem_NN of_IN starting_VBG over_RP but_CC there_EX is_BEZ also_RB a_AT certain_JJ depreciation_NN in_IN the_AT market_NN value_NN of_IN his_PP$ services_NNS ._. A_AT man_NN does_DOZ not_* make_VB that_DT kind_NN of_IN gamble_NN if_CS he_PPS suspects_VBZ that_CS one_CD or_CC more_AP of_IN the_AT limited_VBN number_NN of_IN tenure_NN positions_NNS is_BEZ being_BEG reserved_VBN for_IN members_NNS of_IN the_AT ``_`` family_NN ''_'' ._. Just_RB as_CS it_PPS is_BEZ possible_JJ to_TO exaggerate_VB the_AT drawing_VBG power_NN of_IN the_AT new_JJ tenure_NN practices_NNS ,_, it_PPS is_BEZ also_RB possible_JJ to_TO exaggerate_VB the_AT significance_NN of_IN the_AT now_RB relatively_QL adequate_JJ salaries_NNS paid_VBN by_IN major_JJ Catholic_JJ institutions_NNS ._. Adequate_AT compensation_NN is_BEZ indispensable_JJ ._. Yet_CC adequate_JJ compensation_NN --_-- and_CC particularly_QL merely_RB adequate_JJ compensation_NN is_BEZ no_AT substitute_NN for_IN those_DTS intangibles_NNS which_WDT cause_VB a_AT man_NN to_TO sacrifice_VB part_NN of_IN his_PP$ earning_VBG potential_NN by_IN taking_VBG up_RP college_NN teaching_NN in_IN the_AT first_OD place_NN ._. Broadly_IN speaking_VBG the_AT total_JJ Catholic_JJ atmosphere_NN is_BEZ such_ABL an_AT intangible_JJ but_CC the_AT larger_JJR demand_NN is_BEZ for_IN a_AT sense_NN of_IN creative_JJ participation_NN and_CC mature_JJ responsibility_NN in_IN the_AT total_JJ work_NN of_IN the_AT university_NN ._. Religious_JJ who_WPS derive_VB their_PP$ own_JJ sense_NN of_IN purpose_NN through_IN identification_NN with_IN the_AT religious_JJ community_NN rather_IN than_CS the_AT academic_JJ community_NN are_BER prone_JJ to_TO underestimate_VB both_ABX the_AT layman's_JJ reservoir_NN of_IN idealism_NN and_CC his_PP$ need_NN for_IN this_DT identification_NN ._. There_EX is_BEZ no_AT need_NN here_RB to_TO spell_VB out_RP the_AT conditions_NNS of_IN creative_JJ teaching_NN except_IN to_IN point_NN out_IN that_DT ,_, at_IN the_AT college_NN level_NN ,_, the_AT sense_NN of_IN community_NN and_CC of_IN community_NN responsibility_NN is_BEZ even_QL more_AP necessary_JJ than_CS it_PPS is_BEZ at_IN other_AP levels_VBZ ._. But_CC this_DT in_IN turn_NN means_VBZ that_CS decisions_NNS are_BER not_* merely_RB imposed_VBN from_IN the_AT top_NN but_CC that_CS there_EX be_BE some_DTI actual_JJ mechanism_NN of_IN faculty_NN participation_NN ._. The_AT second_OD reason_NN for_IN being_BEG concerned_VBN with_IN the_AT dichotomy_NN between_IN faculty_NN members_NNS who_WPS are_BER part_NN of_IN the_AT ``_`` in-group_NN ''_'' that_WPS owns_VBZ and_CC operates_VBZ the_AT institution_NN and_CC those_DTS who_WPS are_BER merely_RB paid_VBN employees_NNS ,_, is_BEZ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, the_AT baneful_JJ effect_NN on_IN the_AT caliber_NN of_IN the_AT teaching_VBG itself_PPL ._. The_AT first_OD is_BEZ a_AT negative_JJ warning_NN :_. there_RB is_BEZ no_AT point_NN in_IN the_AT creation_NN of_IN faculty_NN committees_NNS and_CC advisory_JJ boards_NNS with_IN high-sounding_JJ titles_NNS but_CC no_AT real_JJ authority_NN ._. Competent_AT teachers_NNS are_BER well_QL versed_JJ in_IN the_AT technique_NN of_IN leading_VBG students_NNS to_IN pre-set_AT conclusions_NNS without_IN destroying_VBG the_AT students'_NNS$ illusion_NN that_CS they_PPSS are_BER making_VBG their_PP$ own_JJ decisions_NNS ._. Those_DTS who_WPS have_HV served_VBN as_CS faculty_NN advisers_NNS are_BER too_QL familiar_JJ with_IN the_AT useful_JJ but_CC artificial_JJ mechanisms_NNS of_IN student_NN government_NN to_TO be_BE taken_VBN in_RP by_IN ``_`` busy-work_UH ''_'' and_CC ersatz_NN decision_NN making_VBG ._. In_IN any_DTI case_NN it_PPS is_BEZ by_IN no_AT means_NN clear_JJ that_CS formally_RB structured_VBN organs_NNS of_IN participation_NN are_BER what_WDT is_BEZ called_VBN for_IN at_IN all_ABN ._. In_IN the_AT Notre_NN Dame_IN report_NN ,_, reference_NN was_BEDZ made_VBN to_IN the_AT fact_NN that_CS faculty_NN members_NNS were_BED reduced_VBN to_TO ``_`` luncheon-table_PPSS communication_NN ''_'' ._. In_IN itself_PPL there_EX is_BEZ nothing_PN wrong_JJ with_IN this_DT form_NN of_IN ``_`` participation_NN ''_'' :_. the_AT only_RB difficulty_NN on_IN the_AT Catholic_JJ campus_NN is_BEZ that_CS those_DTS faculty_NN members_NNS who_WPS are_BER in_IN a_AT position_NN to_TO implement_VB policy_NN ,_, i.e._RB ,_, members_NNS of_IN the_AT religious_JJ community_NN which_WDT owns_VBZ and_CC administers_^ the_AT institution_NN ,_, have_HV their_PP$ own_JJ eating_VBG arrangements_NNS ._. Sen._NP John_NP L._NP McClellan_NP of_IN Arkansas_NP and_CC Rep._NP David_NP Martin_NP of_IN Nebraska_NP are_BER again_RB beating_NN the_AT drums_NNS to_TO place_VB the_AT unions_NNS under_IN the_AT anti-monopoly_JJ laws_NNS ._. Once_RB more_RBR the_AT fallacious_JJ equation_NN is_BEZ advanced_VBN to_TO argue_VB that_CS since_CS business_NN is_BEZ restricted_VBN under_IN the_AT anti-monopoly_NN laws_NNS ,_, there_EX must_MD be_BE a_AT corresponding_JJ restriction_NN against_IN labor_NN unions_NNS :_. the_AT law_NN must_MD treat_NN everybody_PN equally_RB ._. Or_CC ,_, in_IN the_AT words_NNS of_IN Anatole_AT France_NP ,_, ``_`` The_AT law_NN in_IN its_PP$ majestic_JJ equality_NN must_MD forbid_VB the_AT rich_JJ ,_, as_QL well_RB as_CS the_AT poor_JJ ,_, from_IN begging_VBG in_IN the_AT streets_NNS and_CC sleeping_VBG under_IN bridges_NNS ''_'' ._. The_AT public_JJ atmosphere_NN that_WPS has_HVZ been_BEN generated_VBN which_WDT makes_VBZ acceptance_NN of_IN this_DT law_NN a_AT possibility_NN stems_VBZ from_IN the_AT disrepute_NN into_IN which_WDT the_AT labor_NN movement_NN has_HVZ fallen_VBN as_CS a_AT result_NN of_IN Mr._NP McClellan's_NP$ hearings_NNS into_IN corruption_NN in_IN labor-management_NN relations_NNS and_CC ,_, later_RBR ,_, into_IN the_AT jurisdictional_JJ squabbles_NNS that_WPS plagued_VBD industrial_JJ relations_NNS at_IN the_AT missile_NN sites_NNS ._. The_AT Senator_NN was_BEDZ shocked_VBN by_IN stoppages_NN over_IN allegedly_QL trivial_JJ disputes_NNS that_WPS delayed_VBD our_PP$ missile_NN program_NN ._. In_IN addition_NN ,_, disclosures_NNS that_CS missile_NN workers_NNS were_BED earning_VBG sums_NNS far_RB in_IN excess_JJ of_IN what_WDT is_BEZ paid_VBN for_IN equivalent_JJ work_NN elsewhere_RB provoked_VBD his_PP$ indignation_NN on_IN behalf_NN of_IN the_AT American_JJ taxpayer_NN who_WPS was_BEDZ footing_VBG the_AT bill_NN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ now_RB disclosed_VBN that_CS the_AT taxpayer_NN not_* only_RB pays_VBZ for_IN high_JJ wages_NNS ,_, but_CC he_PPS pays_VBZ the_AT employers'_JJ strike_NN expenses_NNS when_WRB the_AT latter_AP undertakes_VBZ to_TO fight_VB a_AT strike_VB ._. Business_NN Week_NN (_( Aug._CD 9_CD ,_, 1961_CD )_) reports_VBZ that_CS the_AT United_VBN Aircraft_NN Company_NN ,_, against_IN which_WDT the_AT International_JJ Association_NN of_IN Machinists_NNS had_HVD undertaken_VBN a_AT strike_NN ,_, decided_VBD to_TO keep_VB its_PP$ plants_NNS operating_VBG ._. The_AT company_NN incurred_VBN some_DTI $10_NNS million_CD of_IN expenses_NNS attributable_JJ to_IN four_CD factors_NNS :_. advertising_VBG to_TO attract_VB new_JJ employees_NNS ,_, hiring_VBG and_CC training_VBG them_PPO ,_, extra_JJ overtime_NN ,_, and_CC defective_JJ work_NN performed_VBD by_IN the_AT new_JJ workers_NNS ._. The_AT company_NN has_HVZ billed_VBN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS Government_NN for_IN $7,500,000_NN of_IN these_DTS expenses_NNS under_IN the_AT Defense_NN Department_NN regulation_NN allowing_VBG costs_NNS of_IN a_AT type_NN generally_RB recognized_VBN as_QL ordinary_JJ and_CC necessary_JJ for_IN the_AT conduct_NN of_IN the_AT contractor's_JJ business_NN ._. Rep._NP Frank_NP Kowalski_VBD of_IN Connecticut_NP has_HVZ brought_VBN this_DT problem_NN to_IN the_AT attention_NN of_IN the_AT Armed_VBN Services_NNS Committee_NN ._. The_AT committee_NN remains_VBZ unresponsive_JJ ._. Neither_DTX has_HVZ Congressman_NN Martin_NP nor_CC Senator_NN McClellan_NP been_BEN heard_VBN from_IN on_IN the_AT matter_NN ;_. ;_. they_PPSS are_BER preoccupied_VBN with_IN ending_NN labor_NN abuses_NNS by_IN extending_VBG the_AT anti-monopoly_^ laws_NNS to_TO the_AT unions_NNS ._. The_AT recent_JJ publicity_NN attending_VBG the_AT successful_JJ federal_JJ prosecution_NN of_IN a_AT conspiracy_NN indictment_NN against_IN a_AT number_NN of_IN electrical_JJ manufacturers_NNS has_HVZ evoked_VBN a_AT new_JJ respect_NN for_IN the_AT anti-trust_JJ laws_NNS that_WPS is_BEZ justified_VBN neither_CC by_IN their_PP$ rationale_NN nor_CC by_IN the_AT results_NNS they_PPSS have_HV obtained_VBN ._. The_AT anti-trust_JJ laws_NNS inform_VB a_AT business_NN that_CS it_PPS must_MD compete_VB ,_, but_CC along_RB completely_QL undefined_JJ lines_NNS ;_. ;_. it_PPS must_MD play_VB a_AT game_NN in_IN which_WDT there_RB never_RB is_BEZ a_AT winner_NN ._. The_AT fact_NN is_BEZ that_CS any_DTI business_NN that_WPS wants_VBZ to_TO operate_VB successfully_RB cannot_MD* follow_VB the_AT law_NN ._. Hypocrisy_`` thus_RB becomes_VBZ the_AT answer_NN to_IN a_AT foolish_JJ public_JJ policy_NN ._. Let_VB us_PPO look_VB at_IN the_AT heavy-electrical-goods_JJ industry_NN in_IN which_WDT General_JJ Electric_NN ,_, Westinghouse_NP and_CC a_AT number_NN of_IN other_AP manufacturers_NNS were_BED recently_RB convicted_VBN of_IN engaging_VBG in_IN a_AT conspiracy_NN to_IN rig_NN prices_NNS and_CC allocate_VB the_AT market_NN ._. The_AT industry_NN is_BEZ so_QL structured_VBN that_DT price-setting_NN by_IN a_AT multi-product_JJ company_NN will_MD vary_VB with_IN the_AT way_NN overhead_RB charges_NNS are_BER allocated_VBN --_-- whether_CS marginal_JJ or_CC average_JJ pricing_NN is_BEZ applied_VBN ._. The_AT problem_NN becomes_VBZ even_RB more_QL complex_JJ where_WRB an_AT enterprise_NN is_BEZ engaged_VBN in_IN the_AT manufacture_NN of_IN a_AT wide_JJ variety_NN of_IN other_AP goods_NNS in_IN addition_NN to_IN the_AT heavy_JJ electrical_JJ equipment_NN ._. Accounting_VBG procedures_NNS can_MD be_BE varied_VBN to_TO provide_VB a_AT rationale_NN for_IN almost_RB any_DTI price_NN ._. Naturally_RB ,_, enterprises_NNS of_IN the_AT size_NN of_IN General_JJ Electric_NN are_BER in_IN a_AT position_NN to_IN structure_NN their_PP$ prices_NNS in_IN such_ABL a_AT way_NN that_CS the_AT relatively_QL small_JJ competitors_NNS can_MD be_BE forced_VBN to_IN the_AT wall_NN in_IN a_AT very_QL short_JJ time_NN ._. Should_MD these_DTS giants_NNS really_RB flex_NN their_PP$ competitive_JJ muscles_NNS ,_, they_PPSS would_MD become_VB the_AT only_RB survivors_NNS in_IN the_AT industry_NN ._. Uncle_NP Sam_NP would_MD then_RB accuse_VB them_PPO of_IN creating_VBG a_AT monopoly_NN by_IN ``_`` unfair_JJ competition_NN ''_'' ._. But_CC if_CS they_PPSS show_VB self-restraint_PPO ,_, they_PPSS don't_DO* get_VB the_AT orders_NNS ._. Under_IN the_AT circumstances_NNS ,_, the_AT only_AP protection_NN for_IN the_AT relatively_QL small_JJ manufacturers_NNS is_BEZ to_TO engage_VB in_IN exactly_RB the_AT kind_NN of_IN conspiracy_NN with_IN the_AT giants_NNS for_IN which_WDT the_AT latter_AP were_BED convicted_VBD ._. Engaging_RB in_IN such_ABL a_AT conspiracy_NN was_BEDZ an_AT act_NN of_IN mercy_NN by_IN the_AT giants_NNS ._. The_AT paradox_NN implicit_JJ in_IN the_AT whole_JJ affair_NN is_BEZ shown_VBN by_IN the_AT demand_NN of_IN the_AT government_NN ,_, after_CS the_AT conviction_NN ,_, that_CS General_JJ Electric_JJ sign_NN a_AT wide-open_JJ consent_NN decree_NN that_CS it_PPS would_MD not_* reduce_VB prices_NNS so_CS low_JJ as_CS to_TO compete_VB seriously_RB with_IN its_PP$ fellows_NNS ._. In_IN other_AP words_NNS ,_, the_AT anti-trust_JJ laws_NNS ,_, designed_VBN to_TO reduce_VB prices_NNS to_IN the_AT consumer_NN on_IN Monday_NR ,_, Wednesday_NR and_CC Friday_NR ,_, become_VB a_AT tool_NN to_TO protect_VB the_AT marginal_JJ manufacturer_NN on_IN Tuesday_NR ,_, Thursday_NR and_CC Saturday_NR ._. And_CC which_WDT theory_NN would_MD govern_VB the_AT enforcers_NN of_IN the_AT law_NN on_IN Sunday_NR ?_. The_AT question_NN might_MD be_BE asked_VBN :_. ``_`` Don't_DO* the_AT managements_^ of_IN the_AT heavy-electrical-goods_^ manufacturers_NNS know_VB these_DTS facts_NNS ?_. Why_WRB did_DOD they_PPSS engage_VB in_IN a_AT flood_NN of_IN mea_PP$ culpas_NN ,_, throw_VB a_AT few_AP scapegoats_NN to_IN the_AT dogs_NNS and_CC promise_NN to_TO be_BE good_JJ boys_NNS thereafter_RB ,_, expressing_VBG their_PP$ complete_JJ confidence_NN in_IN the_AT laws_NNS ''_'' ?_. The_AT past_AP usefulness_NN of_IN the_AT anti-trust_JJ laws_NNS to_IN management_NN was_BEDZ explained_VBN by_IN Thurman_AT Arnold_NP ,_, in_IN The_AT Folklore_NN of_IN Capitalism_NN ,_, back_RB in_IN 1937_CD ._. He_PPS wrote_VBD :_. ``_`` (_( P._NP 211_^ )_) the_AT anti-trust_JJ laws_NNS were_BED the_AT answer_NN of_IN a_AT society_NN which_WDT unconsciously_RB felt_VBN the_AT need_VB of_IN great_JJ organizations_NNS ,_, and_CC at_IN the_AT same_AP time_NN had_HVD to_TO deny_VB them_PPO a_AT place_NN in_IN the_AT moral_JJ and_CC logical_JJ ideology_NN of_IN the_AT social_JJ structure_NN ._. (_( P._NP 214_CD )_) anti-trust_JJ laws_NNS became_VBD the_AT greatest_JJT protection_NN to_IN uncontrolled_JJ business_NN dictatorship_NN ._. (_( P._NP 215_NP )_) when_WRB corporate_JJ abuses_NNS were_BED attacked_VBN ,_, it_PPS was_BEDZ done_VBN on_IN the_AT theory_NN that_CS criminal_JJ penalties_NNS would_MD be_BE invoked_VBN rather_RB than_CS control_NN ._. In_IN this_DT manner_NN ,_, every_AT scheme_NN for_IN direct_JJ control_NN broke_VBD to_IN pieces_NNS on_IN the_AT great_JJ protective_JJ rock_NN of_IN the_AT anti-trust_JJ laws_NNS ._. (_( Pp._NNS 228-229_. )_) in_IN any_DTI event_NN ,_, it_PPS is_BEZ obvious_JJ that_CS the_AT anti-trust_JJ laws_NNS did_DOD not_* prevent_VB the_AT formation_NN of_IN some_DTI of_IN the_AT greatest_JJT financial_JJ empires_NNS the_AT world_NN has_HVZ ever_RB known_VBN ,_, held_VBD together_RB by_IN some_DTI of_IN the_AT most_QL fantastic_JJ ideas_NNS ,_, all_ABN based_VBN on_IN the_AT fundamental_JJ notion_NN that_CS a_AT corporation_NN is_BEZ an_AT individual_NN who_WPS can_MD trade_VB and_CC exchange_NN goods_NNS without_IN control_NN by_IN the_AT government_NN ''_'' ._. This_DT escape_NN from_IN control_NN has_HVZ led_VBN to_IN management's_NN$ evaluating_VBG the_AT risk_NN of_IN occasional_JJ irrational_JJ prosecution_NN as_CS worth_JJ while_CS ._. A_AT plea_NN of_IN nolo_AT contendere_NN ,_, followed_VBN by_IN a_AT nominal_JJ fine_JJ ,_, after_CS all_ABN is_BEZ a_AT small_JJ price_NN to_IN pay_VB for_IN this_DT untrammeled_JJ license_NN ._. (_( The_AT penalties_NNS handed_VBD out_RP in_IN the_AT electrical_JJ case_NN ,_, which_WDT included_VBD jail_NN sentences_NNS ,_, were_BED unprecedented_JJ in_IN anti-trust_JJ prosecutions_NN ,_, perhaps_RB because_CS the_AT conspirators_NNS had_HVD displayed_VBN unusual_JJ ineptness_NN in_IN their_PP$ pricing_NN activities_NNS ._. )_) If_CS a_AT substitute_JJ mechanism_NN is_BEZ needed_VBN for_IN the_AT control_NN of_IN a_AT fictitious_JJ impersonal_JJ market_NN ,_, quite_QL obviously_RB some_DTI method_NN must_MD be_BE devised_VBN for_IN representing_VBG the_AT public_JJ interest_NN ._. A_AT secret_JJ conspiracy_NN of_IN manufacturers_NNS is_BEZ hardly_RB such_ABL a_AT vehicle_NN ._. However_RB ,_, one_PN can_MD argue_VB that_CS no_AT such_JJ control_NN is_BEZ necessary_JJ as_CS long_JJ as_CS one_PN pretends_VBZ that_CS the_AT anti-trust_JJ laws_NNS are_BER effective_JJ and_CC rational_JJ ._. Quite_QL clearly_RB the_AT anti-trust_JJ laws_NNS are_BER neither_RB effective_JJ nor_CC rational_JJ --_-- and_CC yet_RB the_AT argument_NN goes_VBZ that_CS they_PPSS should_MD be_BE extended_VBN to_IN the_AT labor_NN union_NN ._. Those_DTS who_WPS favor_VB placing_VBG trade_NN unions_NNS under_IN anti-trust_JJ laws_NNS imply_VB that_CS they_PPSS are_BER advocating_VBG a_AT brand_NN new_JJ reform_NN ._. Before_CS 1933_CD ,_, individuals_NNS who_WPS opposed_VBD trade_NN unions_NNS and_CC collective_JJ bargaining_NN said_VBD so_CS in_IN plain_JJ English_NP ._. The_AT acceptance_NN of_IN collective_JJ bargaining_NN as_CS a_AT national_JJ policy_NN in_IN 1934_CD ,_, implicit_JJ in_IN the_AT writing_NN of_IN Section_NN 7A_NN of_IN the_AT National_JJ Industrial_JJ Recovery_NN Act_NN ,_, has_HVZ made_VBN it_PPO impolitic_JJ to_TO oppose_VB collective_JJ bargaining_NN in_IN principle_NN ._. The_AT Wagner_NP Act_NN ,_, the_AT Taft-Hartley_NP Act_NN and_CC the_AT Landrum-Griffin_JJ Act_NN all_ABN endorse_VB the_AT principle_NN of_IN collective_JJ bargaining_NN ._. The_AT basic_JJ purpose_NN of_IN an_AT effective_JJ collective-bargaining_NN system_NN is_BEZ the_AT removal_NN of_IN wages_NNS from_IN competition_NN ._. If_CS a_AT union_NN cannot_MD* perform_VB this_DT function_NN ,_, then_RB collective_JJ bargaining_NN is_BEZ being_BEG palmed_VBD off_RP by_IN organizers_NNS as_CS a_AT gigantic_JJ fraud_NN ._. The_AT tortured_VBN reasoning_NN that_CS unions_NNS use_VB to_TO deny_VB their_PP$ ambition_NN to_TO exercise_VB monopoly_NN power_NN over_IN the_AT supply_NN and_CC price_NN of_IN labor_NN is_BEZ one_CD of_IN the_AT things_NNS that_WPS create_VB a_AT legal_JJ profession_NN ._. The_AT problem_NN must_MD be_BE faced_VBN squarely_RB ._. If_CS laborers_NNS are_BER merely_RB commodities_NNS competing_VBG against_IN each_DT other_AP in_IN a_AT market_NN place_NN like_CS so_CS many_AP bags_NNS of_IN wheat_NN and_CC corn_NN (_( unsupported_NP ,_, by_IN the_AT way_NN ,_, by_IN any_DTI agricultural_JJ subsidy_NN )_) ,_, then_RB they_PPSS may_MD be_BE pardoned_VBN for_IN reacting_VBG with_IN complete_JJ antagonism_NN to_IN a_AT system_NN that_WPS imposes_VBZ such_JJ status_NN upon_IN them_PPO ._. Human_JJ labor_NN was_BEDZ exactly_RB that_CS --_-- a_AT commodity_NN --_-- in_IN eighteenth-_NN and_CC nineteenth-century_NN America_NP ._. As_CS early_JJ as_CS 1776_CD ,_, Adam_NP Smith_NP wrote_VBD in_IN The_AT Wealth_NN Of_IN Nations_NNS :_. ``_`` We_PPSS have_HV no_AT acts_NNS of_IN Parliament_NN against_IN combining_VBG to_TO lower_JJR the_AT price_NN of_IN work_NN ;_. ;_. but_CC many_AP against_IN combining_VBG to_TO raise_VB it_PPS ''_'' ._. Eighteenth-century_NP England_NP ,_, upon_IN whose_WP$ customs_NNS our_PP$ common_JJ law_NN was_BEDZ built_VBN ,_, had_HVD outlawed_VBN unions_NNS as_CS monopolies_NNS and_CC conspiracies_NNS ._. In_IN 1825_CD ,_, the_AT Boston_NP house_NN carpenters'_TO strike_VB for_IN a_AT ten-hour_JJ day_NN was_BEDZ denounced_VBN by_IN the_AT organized_VBN employers_NNS ,_, who_WPS declared_VBN :_. ``_`` It_PPS is_BEZ considered_VBN that_CS all_ABN combinations_NNS by_IN any_DTI classes_NNS of_IN citizens_NNS intended_VBN to_TO effect_NN the_AT value_NN of_IN labor_NN tend_VB to_TO convert_VB all_ABN its_PP$ branches_NNS into_IN monopolies_NNS ''_'' ._. There_EX were_BED no_QL pious_JJ hypocrisies_NN then_RB about_IN being_BEG for_IN collective_JJ bargaining_NN ,_, but_CC against_IN labor_NN monopoly_NN ._. The_AT courts_NNS shared_VBD the_AT opinion_NN of_IN the_AT employers_NNS ._. In_IN People_NNS vs._IN Fisher_NP ,_, Justice_NP Savage_NP of_IN the_AT New_JJ York_NP Supreme_JJ Court_NN declared_VBN :_. ``_`` Without_IN any_DTI officious_^ and_CC improper_^ interference_NN on_IN the_AT subject_JJ ,_, the_AT price_NN of_IN labor_NN or_CC the_AT wages_NNS of_IN mechanics_NNS will_MD be_BE regulated_VBN by_IN the_AT demand_NN for_IN the_AT manufactured_VBN article_NN and_CC the_AT value_NN of_IN that_CS which_WDT is_BEZ paid_VBN for_IN it_PPS ;_. ;_. but_CC the_AT right_NR does_DOZ not_* exist_VB to_TO raise_VB the_AT wages_NNS of_IN the_AT mechanic_NN by_IN any_DTI forced_VBN and_CC artificial_JJ means_NN ''_'' ._. Compare_VB this_DT statement_NN of_IN a_AT nineteenth-century_NN judge_NN with_IN how_WRB Congressman_NN Martin_NP ,_, according_IN to_IN the_AT Daily_JJ Labor_NN Report_NN of_IN Sept._NP 19_CD ,_, 1961_CD ,_, defends_VBZ the_AT necessity_NN of_IN enacting_VBG anti-trust_JJ legislation_NN in_IN the_AT field_NN of_IN labor_NN ``_`` if_CS we_PPSS wish_VB to_TO prevent_VB monopolistic_AT fixing_NN of_IN wages_NNS ,_, production_NN or_CC prices_NNS and_CC if_CS we_PPSS wish_VB to_TO preserve_VB the_AT freedom_NN of_IN the_AT employer_NN and_CC his_PP$ employees_NNS to_IN contract_NN on_IN wages_NNS ,_, hours_NNS and_CC conditions_NNS of_IN employment_NN ''_'' ._. Senator_NN McClellan_NP is_BEZ proposing_VBG the_AT application_NN of_IN anti-trust_JJ measures_NNS to_IN unions_NNS in_IN transportation_NN ._. The_AT passage_NN of_IN the_AT Sherman_NP Act_NN was_BEDZ aimed_VBN at_IN giant_JJ monopolies_NNS ._. It_PPS was_BEDZ most_QL effective_JJ against_IN trade_NN unions_NNS ._. In_IN 1914_CD ,_, the_AT Clayton_NP Act_NN attempted_VBD to_TO take_VB labor_NN out_RP from_IN under_IN the_AT anti-trust_JJ legislation_NN by_IN stating_VBG that_CS human_JJ labor_NN was_BEDZ not_* to_TO be_BE considered_VBN a_AT commodity_NN ._. The_AT man_NN was_BEDZ King_NN Leopold_IN 2_CD ,_, of_IN the_AT Belgians_NPS ,_, who_WPS in_IN 1885_CD concluded_VBD that_CS he_PPS had_HVD better_JJR grab_VB a_AT colony_NN while_CS the_AT grabbing_VBG was_BEDZ still_RB good_JJ ._. The_AT population_NN of_IN the_AT Congo_NP is_BEZ 13.5_CD million_CD ,_, divided_VBN into_IN at_IN least_AP seven_CD major_JJ ``_`` culture_NN clusters_NNS ''_'' and_CC innumerable_JJ tribes_NNS speaking_VBG 400_CD separate_JJ dialects_NNS ._. But_CC by_IN 1908_CD its_PP$ record_NN of_IN brutality_NN had_HVD touched_VBN the_AT national_JJ conscience_NN ._. One_CD definition_NN of_IN paternalism_NN is_BEZ ``_`` The_AT principle_NN or_CC practice_NN ,_, on_IN the_AT part_NN of_IN a_AT government_NN ,_, of_IN managing_VBG the_AT affairs_NNS of_IN a_AT country_NN in_IN the_AT manner_NN of_IN a_AT father_NN dealing_VBG with_IN his_PP$ children_NNS ''_'' ._. The_AT honor_NN of_IN the_AT Belgians_NPS in_IN this_DT matter_NN is_BEZ not_* to_TO be_BE questioned_VBN --_-- only_RB their_PP$ judgment_NN ._. The_AT Belgians_NPS were_BED interested_VBN primarily_RB in_IN the_AT economic_JJ development_NN of_IN the_AT Congo_NP ,_, which_WDT is_BEZ rich_JJ in_IN copper_NN ,_, tin_NN ,_, cobalt_NN ,_, manganese_NP ,_, zinc_NN ,_, and_CC uranium_NN ,_, and_CC cotton_NN and_CC palm_NN oil_NN ._. The_AT colony_NN was_BEDZ administered_VBN from_IN Brussels_NP ,_, with_IN neither_CC the_AT Congolese_NN nor_CC the_AT resident_JJ Belgians_NPS having_HVG any_DTI vote_NN ._. Had_HVD they_PPSS been_BEN truly_QL ruthless_JJ ,_, the_AT Belgians_NPS might_MD have_HV exploited_VBN the_AT Congolese_NN without_IN compassion_NN ._. But_CC they_PPSS were_BED not_* ._. Would_MD not_* the_AT children_NNS ,_, if_CS they_PPSS received_VBD all_ABN their_PP$ food_NN on_IN the_AT first_OD day_NN of_IN the_AT month_NN ,_, eat_VB it_PPO up_RP immediately_RB ,_, and_CC later_RBR go_VB hungry_JJ ?_. The_AT Belgians_NPS also_RB placed_VBN great_JJ emphasis_NN on_IN education_NN ._. During_IN the_AT 1950s_NNS there_EX were_BED as_QL many_AP as_CS 25,000_CD schools_NNS in_IN the_AT Congo_NP ._. But_CC almost_RB all_ABN the_AT schools_NNS were_BED primary_JJ ._. Some_DTI schools_NNS were_BED technical_JJ --_-- the_AT Belgians_NPS needed_VBD carpenters_NNS and_CC mechanics_NNS to_TO help_VB exploit_VB the_AT land_NN ,_, and_CC trained_VBN many_AP ._. It_PPS was_BEDZ their_PP$ conviction_NN that_CS the_AT people_NNS should_MD be_BE ``_`` brought_VBD up_RP together_RB ''_'' ,_, a_AT grade_NN at_IN a_AT time_NN ,_, until_CS in_IN some_DTI indefinite_JJ future_NN some_DTI might_MD be_BE ready_JJ to_TO tackle_VB history_NN ,_, economics_NN and_CC political_JJ science_NN ._. Indeed_RB ,_, the_AT Belgians_NPS discouraged_VBN higher_JJR education_NN ,_, fearing_VBG the_AT creation_NN of_IN a_AT native_JJ intellectual_NN elite_NN which_WDT might_MD cause_VB unrest_NN ._. When_WRB the_AT Congo_NP received_VBD its_PP$ independence_NN in_IN 1960_CD there_EX were_BED ,_, among_IN its_PP$ 13.5_CD million_CD people_NNS ,_, exactly_RB 14_CD university_NN graduates_NNS ._. Why_WRB did_DOD the_AT Belgians_NPS grant_VB independence_NN to_IN a_AT colony_NN so_QL manifestly_RB unprepared_JJ to_TO accept_VB it_PPS ?_. ''_'' (_( Not_* one_CD drop_NN of_IN blood_NN !_. )_) ._. The_AT Belgians_NPS would_MD not_* fight_VB for_IN the_AT privilege_NN of_IN being_BEG the_AT detested_VBD pedagogue_^ ;_. ;_. rather_QL than_CS teach_VB where_WRB teaching_NN was_BEDZ not_* wanted_VBD ,_, they_PPSS would_MD wash_VB their_PP$ hands_NNS of_IN the_AT mess_NN ._. As_CS the_AT time_NN for_IN independence_NN approached_VBD there_EX were_BED in_IN the_AT Congo_NP no_AT fewer_AP than_CS 120_CD political_JJ parties_NNS ,_, or_CC approximately_RB eight_CD for_IN each_DT university_NN graduate_NN ._. There_EX were_BED four_CD principal_JJS ones_NNS ._. First_RB ,_, there_EX were_BED those_DTS Congolese_NNS (_( among_IN them_PPO Joseph_NP Kasavubu_NP )_) who_WPS favored_VBD splitting_VBG the_AT country_NN into_IN small_JJ independent_JJ states_NNS ,_, Balkanizing_CS it_PPS ._. Second_RB ,_, there_EX were_BED those_DTS (_( Moise_NP Tshombe_NP )_) who_WPS favored_VBD near-Balkanization_RB ,_, a_AT loose_JJ federalism_NN having_HVG a_AT central_JJ government_NN of_IN limited_VBN authority_NN ,_, with_IN much_AP power_NN residing_VBG in_IN the_AT states_NNS ._. Third_RB ,_, there_EX were_BED those_DTS (_( notably_RB Patrice_NP Lumumba_NP )_) who_WPS favored_VBD a_AT unified_VBN Congo_NP with_IN a_AT very_QL strong_JJ central_JJ government_NN ._. And_CC fourth_OD ,_, there_EX were_BED moderates_NNS who_WPS were_BED in_IN no_AT hurry_NN for_IN independence_NN and_CC wished_VBD to_TO wait_VB until_CS the_AT Congo_NP grew_VBD up_RP ._. However_RB ,_, the_AT positions_NNS of_IN all_ABN parties_NNS and_CC leaders_NNS were_BED constantly_RB shifting_VBG ._. A_AT final_JJ factor_NN which_WDT contributed_VBD greatly_RB to_IN the_AT fragmentation_NN of_IN the_AT Congo_NP ,_, immediately_RB after_IN independence_NN ,_, was_BEDZ the_AT provincial_JJ structure_NN that_WPS had_HVD been_BEN established_VBN by_IN the_AT Belgians_NPS for_IN convenience_NN in_IN administration_NN ._. They_PPSS had_HVD divided_VBN the_AT Congo_NP into_IN six_CD provinces_NNS --_-- Leopoldville_NP ,_, Kasai_NP ,_, Kivu_NP ,_, Katanga_NP ,_, Equator_NN and_CC Eastern_JJ --_-- unfortunately_RB with_IN little_AP regard_NN for_IN ethnic_JJ groupings_NNS ._. Thus_RB some_DTI provinces_NNS contained_VBN tribes_NNS which_WDT detested_VBD each_DT other_AP ,_, and_CC to_IN them_PPO independence_NN meant_VBD an_AT opportunity_NN for_IN war_NN ._. The_AT Belgian_JJ Congo_NP was_BEDZ granted_VBN its_PP$ independence_NN with_IN what_WDT seemed_VBD a_AT workable_JJ Western-style_NN form_NN of_IN government_NN :_. there_RB were_BED to_TO be_BE a_AT president_NN and_CC a_AT premier_^ ,_, and_CC a_AT bicameral_^ legislature_NN elected_VBN by_IN universal_JJ suffrage_NN in_IN the_AT provinces_NNS ._. Well-wishers_RB around_IN the_AT world_NN hoped_VBD that_CS the_AT Congo_NP would_MD quickly_RB assume_VB a_AT respectable_JJ position_NN in_IN the_AT society_NN of_IN nations_NNS ._. If_CS internal_JJ frictions_NN arose_VBD ,_, they_PPSS could_MD be_BE handled_VBN by_IN the_AT 25,000-man_NN Congolese_IN army_NN ,_, the_AT Force_NN Publique_NN ,_, which_WDT had_HVD been_BEN trained_VBN and_CC was_BEDZ still_RB officered_VBN by_IN white_JJ Belgians_NPS ._. The_AT president_NN ,_, Joseph_NP Kasavubu_NP ,_, seemed_VBD an_AT able_JJ administrator_NN and_CC the_AT premier_NN ,_, Patrice_NP Lumumba_NP ,_, a_AT reasonable_JJ man_NN ._. Twenty-four_CD hours_NNS after_IN independence_NN the_AT wild_JJ tribesmen_NN commenced_VBD fighting_VBG each_DT other_AP ._. Presently_RB the_AT well-armed_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_AT Force_NN Publique_. --_-- many_AP of_IN them_PPO drawn_VBN from_IN savage_JJ and_CC even_RB cannibalistic_IN tribes_NNS ,_, erupted_VBN in_IN mutiny_NN ,_, rioting_NP ,_, raping_NP and_CC looting_VBG ._. Terror_NN engulfed_VBD the_AT thousands_NNS of_IN Belgian_JJ civilians_NNS who_WPS had_HVD remained_VBN in_IN the_AT country_NN ._. The_AT Belgian_JJ government_NN decided_VBD to_TO act_VB ,_, and_CC on_IN July_NP 10_CD dispatched_VBN paratroops_NN to_IN the_AT Congo_NP ._. On_IN July_NP 11_CD the_AT head_NN of_IN the_AT mineral-rich_JJ province_NN of_IN Katanga_NP ,_, Moise_AT Tshombe_NN ,_, announced_VBD that_CS his_PP$ province_NN had_HVD seceded_VBN from_IN the_AT country_NN ._. Confusion_PPS became_VBD chaos_NN ;_. ;_. each_DT succeeding_VBG day_NN brought_VBD new_JJ acts_NNS of_IN violence_NN ._. Lumumba_NP and_CC Kasavubu_PPS blamed_VBD it_PPO all_ABN on_IN the_AT military_JJ intervention_NN by_IN the_AT Belgians_NPS ,_, and_CC appealed_VBD to_IN the_AT United_VBN Nations_NNS to_TO send_VB troops_NNS to_TO oust_VB them_PPO ._. On_IN July_NP 14_CD the_AT Security_NN Council_NN --_-- with_IN France_NP and_CC Great_JJ Britain_NP abstaining_NN --_-- voted_VBD the_AT resolution_NN which_WDT drew_VBD the_AT U.N._NP into_IN the_AT Congo_NP ._. Vague_RB in_IN wording_NN ,_, it_PPS called_VBD for_IN withdrawal_NN of_IN Belgian_JJ troops_NNS and_CC authorized_VBN the_AT Secretary-General_NN ``_`` to_IN take_VB the_AT necessary_JJ steps_NNS to_TO provide_VB the_AT (_( Congolese_CD )_) Government_NN with_IN such_JJ military_JJ assistance_NN as_CS may_MD be_BE necessary_JJ ,_, until_CS ,_, through_IN the_AT efforts_NNS of_IN the_AT Congolese_JJ Government_NN with_IN the_AT technical_JJ assistance_NN of_IN the_AT United_VBN Nations_NNS ,_, the_AT national_JJ security_NN forces_NNS may_MD be_BE able_JJ ,_, in_IN the_AT opinion_NN of_IN the_AT Government_NN ,_, to_TO meet_VB fully_RB their_PP$ tasks_NNS ._. ''_'' Secretary-General_, Hammarskjold_NP decided_VBD that_CS it_PPS would_MD be_BE preferable_JJ if_CS the_AT U.N._NP troops_NNS sent_VBN into_IN the_AT Congo_NP were_BED to_TO come_VB from_IN African_JJ ,_, or_CC at_IN least_AP nonwhite_NNS ,_, nations_NNS --_-- certainly_RB not_* from_IN the_AT U.S._NP ,_, Russia_NP ,_, Great_JJ Britain_NP or_CC France_NP ._. He_PPS quickly_RB called_VBN on_IN Ghana_NP ,_, Tunisia_NP ,_, Morocco_NP ,_, Guinea_NP and_CC Mali_NN ,_, which_WDT dispatched_VBN troops_NNS within_IN hours_NNS ._. Ultimately_RB the_AT U.N._NP army_NN in_IN the_AT Congo_NP reached_VBD a_AT top_JJS strength_NN of_IN 19,000_NN ,_, including_IN about_RB 5,000_CD from_IN India_NP and_CC a_AT few_AP soldiers_NNS from_IN Eire_NN and_CC Sweden_NP ,_, who_WPS were_BED the_AT only_AP whites_NNS ._. It_PPS took_VBD the_AT U.N._NP three_CD months_NNS to_TO bring_VB a_AT modest_JJ form_NN of_IN order_NN to_IN the_AT Congo_NP ._. The_AT Belgians_NPS were_BED reluctant_JJ to_TO withdraw_VB their_PP$ troops_NNS and_CC often_RB obstructed_VBN U.N._NP efforts_NNS ._. The_AT wildly_RB erratic_JJ nature_NN of_IN Patrice_NP Lumumba_NP caused_VBD constant_JJ problems_NNS --_-- he_PPS frequently_RB announced_VBD that_CS he_PPS wanted_VBD the_AT U.N._NP to_TO get_VB out_RP of_IN the_AT Congo_NP along_RB with_IN the_AT Belgians_NPS ,_, and_CC appealed_VBD to_IN Russia_NP for_IN help_VB ._. (_( However_RB ,_, there_EX is_BEZ little_JJ evidence_NN that_CS the_AT late_JJ Lumumba_NP was_BEDZ a_AT Communist_JJ ._. Meanwhile_RB Russia_NP took_VBD every_AT opportunity_NN to_TO meddle_VB in_IN the_AT Congo_NP ,_, sending_VBG Lumumba_NP equipment_NN for_IN his_PP$ ``_`` wars_NNS ''_'' ,_, dispatching_VBG ``_`` technicians_NNS ''_'' and_CC even_RB threatening_VBG ,_, on_IN occasion_NN ,_, to_TO intervene_VB openly_RB ._. But_CC by_IN the_AT end_NN of_IN the_AT three-month_JJ period_NN ,_, in_IN October_NP 1960_CD ,_, something_PN approaching_VBG calm_JJ settled_VBD on_IN the_AT Congo_NP ._. President_NN Kasavubu_CC became_VBD exasperated_VBN with_IN Lumumba_NP and_CC fired_VBD him_PPO ._. Lumumba_NP fired_VBD Kasavubu_^ ._. Control_NN of_IN the_AT government_NN --_-- such_JJ control_NN as_CS there_EX was_BEDZ and_CC such_JJ government_NN as_CS there_EX was_BEDZ --_-- passed_VBN into_IN the_AT hands_NNS of_IN Joseph_NP Mobutu_NP ,_, chief_NN of_IN staff_NN of_IN the_AT Congolese_JJ army_NN ._. Mobutu_`` promptly_RB flung_VBD out_RP the_AT Russians_NPS ,_, who_WPS have_HV not_* since_RB played_VBD any_DTI significant_JJ part_NN on_IN the_AT local_NN scene_NN ,_, although_CS they_PPSS have_HV redoubled_VBN their_PP$ obstructionist_JJ efforts_NNS at_IN U.N._NP headquarters_NN in_IN New_JJ York_NP ._. The_AT Belgians_NPS --_-- at_IN least_AP officially_RB --_-- departed_VBN from_IN the_AT Congo_NP as_CS well_RB ,_, withdrawing_VBG all_ABN of_IN their_PP$ uniformed_JJ troops_NNS ._. But_CC they_PPSS left_VBD behind_IN them_PPO large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN officers_NNS ,_, variously_RB called_VBN ``_`` volunteers_NNS ''_'' or_CC ``_`` mercenaries_NNS ''_'' ,_, who_WPS now_RB staff_VB the_AT army_NN of_IN Moise_AT Tshombe_NN in_IN Katanga_NP ,_, the_AT seceded_JJ province_NN which_WDT ,_, according_RB to_TO Tshombe_VB ,_, holds_VBZ 65%_NN of_IN the_AT mineral_NN wealth_NN of_IN the_AT entire_JJ country_NN ._. From_IN October_NP 1960_CD to_IN February_NP 1961_CD ,_, the_AT U.N._NP forces_NNS in_IN the_AT Congo_NP took_VBD little_AP action_NN ._. There_EX was_BEDZ no_AT directive_NN for_IN it_PPO --_-- the_AT Security_NN Council's_NN$ resolution_NN had_HVD not_* mentioned_VBN political_JJ matters_NNS ,_, and_CC in_NN any_DTI case_NN the_AT United_VBN Nations_NNS by_IN the_AT terms_NNS of_IN its_PP$ charter_NN may_MD not_* interfere_VB in_IN the_AT political_JJ affairs_NNS of_IN any_DTI nation_NN ,_, whether_CS to_TO unify_VB it_PPO ,_, federalize_IN it_PPO or_CC Balkanize_CS it_PPS ._. In_IN such_JJ conditions_NNS all_ABN freedoms_NNS are_BER lost_VBN ._. As_CS the_AT new_JJ clouds_NNS of_IN radioactive_JJ fallout_NN spread_VBD silently_RB and_CC invisibly_RB around_IN the_AT earth_NN ,_, the_AT Soviet_NN Union_NN stands_VBZ guilty_JJ of_IN a_AT monstrous_JJ crime_NN against_IN the_AT human_JJ race_NN ._. But_CC the_AT guilt_NN is_BEZ shared_VBN by_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS ,_, Britain_NP and_CC France_NP ,_, the_AT other_AP members_NNS of_IN the_AT atomic_JJ club_NN ._. Until_CS Moscow_NP resumed_VBD nuclear_JJ testing_NN last_AP September_NP 1_CD ,_, the_AT US_NN and_CC UK_PPS had_HVD released_VBN more_RBR than_CS twice_RB as_CS much_AP radiation_NN into_IN the_AT atmosphere_NN as_CS the_AT Russians_NPS ,_, and_CC the_AT fallout_NN from_IN the_AT earlier_JJR blasts_NNS is_BEZ still_RB coming_VBG down_RP ._. Resuming_AT atmospheric_JJ tests_NNS One_CD of_IN the_AT inescapable_JJ realities_NNS of_IN the_AT Cold_JJ War_NN is_BEZ that_CS it_PPS has_HVZ thrust_VBN upon_IN the_AT West_NR a_AT wholly_QL new_JJ and_CC historically_RB unique_JJ set_NN of_IN moral_JJ dilemmas_NNS ._. The_AT second_OD great_JJ dilemma_NN has_HVZ been_BEN the_AT morality_NN of_IN nuclear_JJ testing_NN ,_, a_AT dilemma_NN which_WDT has_HVZ suddenly_RB become_VB acute_JJ because_CS of_IN the_AT present_JJ series_NN of_IN Soviet_NN tests_NNS ._. When_WRB this_DT second_OD dilemma_NN first_RB became_VBD obvious_JJ --_-- during_IN the_AT mid_JJ to_IN late_JJ '50's_NN --_-- the_AT United_VBN States_NNS appeared_VBD to_TO have_HV three_CD choices_NNS ._. For_IN that_DT is_BEZ the_AT one_CD an_AT increasingly_QL large_JJ number_NN of_IN prominent_JJ Americans_NPS are_BER now_RB proposing_VBG ._. This_DT is_BEZ an_AT ethical_JJ demand_NN which_WDT cannot_MD* be_BE evaded_VBN or_CC glossed_VBD over_RP by_IN talking_VBG exclusively_RB of_IN weapon_NN superiority_NN or_CC even_RB of_IN the_AT evil_NN of_IN Communism_NN ._. There_EX ought_MD to_TO be_BE a_AT point_NN beyond_IN which_WDT we_PPSS will_MD not_* allow_VB ourselves_PPLS to_TO go_VB regardless_RB of_IN what_WDT Russia_NP does_DOZ ._. The_AT refusal_NN to_TO resume_VB atmospheric_JJ testing_NN would_MD be_BE a_AT good_JJ start_NN ._. Ecumenical_PPS hopes_VBZ when_WRB his_PP$ Holiness_NN Pope_NP John_NP 23_CD ,_, first_RB called_VBN for_IN an_AT Ecumenical_JJ Council_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN the_AT same_AP time_NN voiced_VBD his_PP$ yearning_NN for_IN Christian_JJ unity_NN ,_, the_AT enthusiasm_NN among_IN Catholic_JJ and_CC Protestant_JJ ecumenicists_NN was_BEDZ immediate_JJ ._. With_IN good_JJ reason_NN it_PPS appeared_VBD that_CS a_AT new_JJ day_NN was_BEDZ upon_RB divided_VBN Christendom_NP ._. On_IN a_AT misty_JJ Sunday_NR morning_NN last_AP month_NN ,_, a_AT small_JJ band_NN of_IN militant_JJ anti-Communists_NN called_VBN the_AT Minutemen_NN held_VBN maneuvers_NNS in_IN a_AT foggy_JJ field_NN about_IN fifteen_CD miles_NNS east_NR of_IN here_RB ._. Expands_NP and_CC contracts_NNS Dr._NN Bonnor_NN supports_VBZ the_AT idea_NN that_CS the_AT universe_NN both_ABX expands_VBZ and_CC contracts_NNS ,_, that_CS in_IN several_AP billion_CD years_NNS the_AT expansion_NN will_MD slow_VB up_RP and_CC reverse_VB itself_PPL and_CC that_CS the_AT contraction_NN will_MD set_VB in_IN ._. Professor_NN Bondi_IN disagrees_NN with_IN the_AT expansion-contraction_JJ theory_NN ._. He_PPS supports_VBZ the_AT steady-state_JJ theory_NN which_WDT holds_VBZ that_DT matter_NN is_BEZ continually_RB being_BEG created_VBN in_IN space_NN ._. What_WDT makes_VBZ this_DT long_JJ and_CC diverse_JJ tradition_NN essentially_RB one_CD is_BEZ that_CS those_DTS who_WPS have_HV belonged_VBN to_IN it_PPS have_HV been_BEN profoundly_RB in_IN earnest_NN about_IN being_BEG modern_JJ men_NNS in_IN a_AT distinctively_JJ modern_JJ world_NN ._. One_CD hundred_CD years_NNS ago_RB there_RB existed_VBN in_IN England_NP the_AT Association_NN for_IN the_AT Promotion_NN of_IN the_AT Unity_NN of_IN Christendom_NP ._. For_IN the_AT ``_`` tide_NN is_BEZ well_RB on_IN the_AT turn_NN ''_'' ,_, as_CS the_AT London_NP Catholic_JJ weekly_JJ Universe_NN has_HVZ written_VBN ._. One_CD of_IN the_AT ironies_NN of_IN the_AT present_JJ crusade_NN for_IN Christian_JJ unity_NN is_BEZ that_CS there_EX are_BER not_* ,_, relatively_QL speaking_VBG ,_, many_AP real_JJ Christians_NPS to_TO unite_VB ._. One_CD of_IN the_AT more_QL noteworthy_JJ changes_NNS that_WPS have_HV taken_VBN place_NN since_IN the_AT mid-19th_JJ century_NN is_BEZ the_AT situation_NN of_IN Catholics_NPS at_IN Oxford_NP and_CC Cambridge_NP Universities_NNS ._. At_IN Oxford_NP one_CD hundred_CD years_NNS ago_RB there_EX were_BED very_QL few_AP Catholics_NPS ,_, partly_RB because_CS religious_JJ tests_NNS were_BED removed_VBN only_RB in_IN 1854_^ ._. Now_RB ,_, not_* only_RB are_BER there_RB considerably_QL more_QL laity_JJ as_CS students_NNS and_CC professors_NNS at_IN Oxford_NP ,_, but_CC there_RB are_BER also_RB numerous_JJ houses_NNS of_IN religious_JJ orders_NNS existing_VBG in_IN respectable_JJ and_CC friendly_JJ relations_NNS with_IN the_AT non-Catholic_NN members_NNS of_IN the_AT University_NN ._. Further_AP evidence_NN that_CS Roman_JJ Catholicism_NN enjoys_VBZ a_AT more_QL favorable_JJ position_NN today_NR than_CS in_IN 1861_CD is_BEZ the_AT respectful_JJ attention_NN given_VBN to_IN it_PPO in_IN the_AT mass_NN media_NNS of_IN England_NP ._. The_AT Catholic_JJ priest_NN ,_, though_CS somewhat_QL superficially_RB drawn_VBN ,_, easily_RB came_VBD out_RP the_AT best_JJT ._. The_AT death_NN of_IN a_AT man_NN is_BEZ unique_JJ ,_, and_CC yet_RB it_PPS is_BEZ universal_JJ ._. The_AT straight_JJ line_NN would_MD symbolize_VB its_PP$ uniqueness_NN ,_, the_AT circle_NN its_PP$ universality_NN ._. But_CC how_WRB can_MD one_CD figure_NN symbolize_VB both_ABX ?_. Perhaps_RB no_AT church_NN father_NN saw_VBD this_DT concurrence_NN of_IN the_AT unique_JJ and_CC the_AT universal_JJ as_CS clearly_RB ,_, or_CC formulated_VBD it_PPO as_QL precisely_RB ,_, as_CS Irenaeus_^ ._. His_PP$ history_NN is_BEZ his_PP$ alone_RB ,_, yet_CC each_DT man_NN must_MD recognize_VB his_PP$ own_JJ history_NN in_IN it_PPO ._. Each_DT man_NN can_MD identify_VB himself_PPL with_IN the_AT history_NN and_CC the_AT death_NN of_IN Jesus_NP Christ_NP because_CS Jesus_NP Christ_NP has_HVZ identified_VBN himself_PPL with_IN human_JJ history_NN and_CC human_JJ death_NN ,_, coming_VBG as_CS the_AT head_NN of_IN a_AT new_JJ humanity_NN ._. Not_* a_AT circle_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, nor_CC a_AT straight_JJ line_NN ,_, but_CC a_AT spiral_NN represents_VBZ the_AT shape_NN of_IN death_NN as_CS Irenaeus_PPS sees_VBZ it_PPS ;_. ;_. for_IN a_AT spiral_VB has_HVZ motion_NN as_CS well_RB as_CS recurrence_^ ._. As_CS represented_VBN by_IN a_AT spiral_NN ,_, history_NN may_MD ,_, in_IN some_DTI sense_NN ,_, be_BE said_VBN to_TO repeat_VB itself_PPL ;_. ;_. yet_CC each_DT historical_JJ event_NN remains_VBZ unique_JJ ._. Christ_NP is_BEZ both_ABX unique_JJ and_CC universal_JJ ._. The_AT first_OD turn_NN of_IN the_AT spiral_NN is_BEZ the_AT primeval_JJ history_NN of_IN humanity_NN in_IN Adam_NP ._. From_IN God's_NP$ Will_NN and_CC Wisdom_NN ,_, and_CC from_IN virgin_JJ earth_NN ._. For_CS '_' God_NP had_HVD not_* rained_VBN '_' ,_, says_VBZ the_AT Scripture_NN ,_, before_CS man_NN was_BEDZ made_VBN ,_, and_CC there_EX was_BEDZ no_AT man_NN to_IN till_CS the_AT earth_NN ._. From_IN this_DT earth_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, while_CS it_PPS was_BEDZ still_RB virgin_JJ God_NP took_VBD dust_NN and_CC fashioned_VBN the_AT man_NN ,_, the_AT beginning_NN of_IN humanity_NN ''_'' ._. Irenaeus_PPS does_DOZ not_* regard_VB Adam_NP and_CC Eve_NN merely_RB as_QL private_JJ individuals_NNS ,_, but_CC as_QL universal_JJ human_NN beings_NNS ,_, who_WPS were_BED and_CC are_BER all_ABN of_IN humanity_NN ._. Adam_NP and_CC Eve_NN were_BED perfect_JJ ,_, not_* in_IN the_AT sense_NN that_CS they_PPSS possessed_VBD perfection_NN ,_, but_CC in_NN the_AT sense_NN that_CS they_PPSS were_BED capable_JJ of_IN development_NN toward_IN perfection_NN ._. They_PPSS were_BED ,_, in_IN fact_NN ,_, children_NNS ._. Irenaeus_PPS does_DOZ not_* claim_VB pre-existence_PPO for_IN the_AT human_JJ soul_NN ;_. ;_. therefore_RB there_RB is_BEZ no_AT need_VB for_IN him_PPO ,_, as_CS there_RB is_BEZ for_IN Origen_^ ,_, to_TO identify_VB existence_NN itself_PPL with_IN the_AT fall_NN ._. Existence_PPS is_BEZ created_VBN and_CC willed_VBD by_IN God_NP and_CC is_BEZ not_* the_AT consequence_NN of_IN a_AT pre-existent_JJ rebellion_NN or_CC of_IN a_AT cosmic_JJ descent_NN from_IN eternity_NN into_IN history_NN ._. Historical_JJ existence_NN is_BEZ a_AT created_VBN good_JJ ._. The_AT biblical_JJ symbol_NN for_IN this_DT affirmation_NN is_BEZ expressed_VBN in_IN the_AT words_NNS :_. ``_`` So_CS God_NP created_VBN man_NN in_IN his_PP$ own_JJ image_NN ;_. ;_. in_IN the_AT similitude_^ of_IN God_NP he_PPS created_VBN him_PPO ''_'' ._. There_EX are_BER some_DTI passages_NNS in_IN the_AT writings_NNS of_IN Irenaeus_NN where_WRB the_AT image_NN of_IN God_NP and_CC the_AT similitude_NNS are_BER sharply_RB distinguished_VBN ,_, so_QL most_QL notably_RB in_IN the_AT statement_NN :_. ``_`` If_CS the_AT (_( Holy_JJ )_) Spirit_NN is_BEZ absent_JJ from_IN the_AT soul_NN ,_, such_JJ a_AT man_NN is_BEZ indeed_RB of_IN an_AT animal_NN nature_NN ;_. ;_. and_CC ,_, being_BEG left_NR carnal_JJ ,_, he_PPS will_MD be_BE an_AT imperfect_JJ being_BEG ,_, possessing_VBG the_AT image_NN (_( of_IN God_NP )_) in_IN his_PP$ formation_NN ,_, but_CC not_* receiving_VBG the_AT similitude_^ (_( of_IN God_NP )_) through_IN the_AT Spirit_NN ''_'' ._. Thus_RB the_AT image_NN of_IN God_NP is_BEZ that_CS which_WDT makes_VBZ a_AT man_NN a_AT man_NN and_CC not_* an_AT oyster_NN ;_. ;_. the_AT similitude_^ of_IN God_NP ,_, by_IN contrast_NN ,_, is_BEZ that_CS which_WDT makes_VBZ a_AT man_NN a_AT child_NN of_IN God_NP and_CC not_* merely_RB a_AT rational_JJ creature_NN ._. Recent_JJ research_NN on_IN Irenaeus_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, makes_VBZ it_PPO evident_JJ that_CS he_PPS does_DOZ not_* consistently_RB maintain_VB this_DT distinction_NN ._. He_PPS does_DOZ not_* mean_VB to_TO say_VB that_CS Adam_NP lost_VBD the_AT similitude_NN of_IN God_NP and_CC his_PP$ immortality_NN through_IN the_AT fall_NN ;_. ;_. for_IN he_PPS was_BEDZ created_VBN not_* exactly_RB immortal_JJ ,_, nor_CC yet_CC exactly_RB mortal_JJ ,_, but_CC capable_JJ of_IN immortality_NN as_CS well_RB as_CS of_IN mortality_NN ._. Therefore_RB Irenaeus_PPS describes_VBZ man's_NN$ creation_NN as_CS follows_VBZ :_. ``_`` So_CS that_CS the_AT man_NN should_MD not_* have_HV thoughts_NNS of_IN grandeur_NN ,_, and_CC become_VB lifted_VBN up_RP ,_, as_CS if_CS he_PPS had_HVD no_AT lord_NN ,_, because_CS of_IN the_AT dominion_NN that_CS had_HVD been_BEN given_VBN to_TO him_PPO ,_, and_CC the_AT freedom_NN ,_, fall_NN into_IN sin_NN against_IN God_NP his_PP$ Creator_NN ,_, overstepping_^ his_PP$ bounds_NNS ,_, and_CC take_VB up_RP an_AT attitude_NN of_IN self-conceited_^ arrogance_NN towards_IN God_NP ,_, a_AT law_NN was_BEDZ given_VBN him_PPO by_IN God_NP ,_, that_CS he_PPS might_MD know_VB that_CS he_PPS had_HVD for_IN lord_NN the_AT lord_NN of_IN all_ABN ._. And_CC He_PPS laid_VBD down_RP for_IN him_PPO certain_JJ conditions_NNS :_. so_CS that_CS ,_, if_CS he_PPS kept_VBD the_AT command_NN of_IN God_NP ,_, then_RB he_PPS would_MD always_RB remain_VB as_CS he_PPS was_BEDZ ,_, that_CS is_BEZ ,_, immortal_JJ ;_. ;_. but_CC if_CS he_PPS did_DOD not_* ,_, he_PPS would_MD become_VB mortal_JJ ,_, melting_VBG into_IN earth_NN ,_, whence_WRB his_PP$ frame_NN had_HVD been_BEN taken_VBN ''_'' ._. These_DTS conditions_NNS man_NN did_DOD not_* keep_VB ,_, and_CC thus_RB he_PPS became_VBD mortal_JJ ;_. ;_. yet_CC he_PPS did_DOD not_* stop_NN being_BEG human_JJ as_CS a_AT result_NN ._. There_EX is_BEZ no_AT justification_NN for_IN systematizing_VBG the_AT random_JJ statements_NNS of_IN Irenaeus_NN about_IN the_AT image_NN of_IN God_NP beyond_IN this_DT ,_, nor_CC for_IN reading_VBG into_IN his_PP$ imprecise_JJ usage_NN the_AT later_JJR theological_JJ distinction_NN between_IN the_AT image_NN of_IN God_NP (_( humanity_NN )_) and_CC the_AT similitude_NN of_IN God_NP (_( immortality_NN )_) ._. Man_NN was_BEDZ created_VBN with_IN the_AT capacity_NN for_IN immortality_NN ,_, but_CC the_AT devil's_NN$ promise_NN of_IN immortality_NN in_IN exchange_NN for_IN disobedience_AT cost_NN Adam_NP his_PP$ immortality_NN ._. He_PPS was_BEDZ ,_, in_IN the_AT words_NNS of_IN Irenaeus_NN ,_, ``_`` beguiled_NN by_IN another_DT under_IN the_AT pretext_NN of_IN immortality_NN ''_'' ._. The_AT true_JJ way_NN to_IN immortality_NN lay_VBD through_IN obedience_NN ,_, but_CC man_NN did_DOD not_* believe_VB this_DT ._. ``_`` Eve_NP was_BEDZ disobedient_^ ;_. ;_. for_IN she_PPS did_DOD not_* obey_VB when_WRB as_CS yet_CC she_PPS was_BEDZ a_AT virgin_NN ._. And_CC even_RB as_CS she_PPS ,_, having_HVG indeed_RB a_AT husband_NN ,_, Adam_NP ,_, but_CC being_BEG nevertheless_RB as_CS yet_CC a_AT virgin_JJ ,_, having_HVG become_VBN disobedient_NN ,_, was_BEDZ made_VBN the_AT cause_NN of_IN death_NN ,_, both_ABX to_IN herself_PPL and_CC to_IN the_AT entire_JJ human_JJ race_NN ;_. ;_. so_CS also_RB did_DOD Mary_NP ,_, having_HVG a_AT man_NN betrothed_^ (_( to_TO her_PPO )_) ,_, and_CC being_BEG nevertheless_RB a_AT virgin_NN ,_, by_IN yielding_VBG obedience_NN ,_, become_VB the_AT cause_VB of_IN salvation_NN ,_, both_ABX to_TO herself_PPL and_CC the_AT whole_JJ human_JJ race_NN ''_'' ._. Because_CS he_PPS interprets_VBZ the_AT primitive_JJ state_NN of_IN man_NN as_CS one_PN of_IN mere_JJ potentiality_NN or_CC capacity_NN and_CC believes_VBZ that_CS Adam_NP and_CC Eve_NN were_BED created_VBN as_CS children_NNS ,_, Irenaeus_CC often_RB seems_VBZ inclined_VBN to_TO extenuate_VB their_PP$ disobedience_NN as_CS being_BEG ``_`` due_JJ ,_, no_AT doubt_NN ,_, to_IN carelessness_NN ,_, but_CC still_RB wicked_JJ ''_'' ._. His_PP$ interpretation_NN of_IN the_AT beginning_NN on_IN the_AT basis_NN of_IN the_AT end_NN prompts_VBZ him_PPO to_TO draw_VB these_DTS parallels_NNS between_IN the_AT Virgin_NN Eve_NN and_CC the_AT Virgin_NN Mary_NP ._. That_DT parallelism_NN affects_VBZ his_PP$ picture_NN of_IN man's_NN$ disobedience_NN too_QL ;_. ;_. for_IN as_CS it_PPS was_BEDZ Christ_NP ,_, the_AT Word_NN of_IN God_NP ,_, who_WPS came_VBD to_TO rescue_NN man_NN ,_, so_CS it_PPS was_BEDZ disobedience_^ to_TO the_AT word_NN of_IN God_NP in_IN the_AT beginning_VBG that_CS brought_VBD death_NN into_IN the_AT world_NN ,_, and_CC all_ABN our_PP$ woe_NN ._. With_IN this_DT act_NN of_IN disobedience_NN ,_, and_CC not_* with_IN the_AT inception_NN of_IN his_PP$ individual_JJ existence_NN ,_, man_NN began_VBD the_AT downward_RB circuit_NN on_IN the_AT spiral_NN of_IN history_NN ,_, descending_VBG from_IN the_AT created_VBN capacity_NN for_IN immortality_NN to_IN an_AT inescapable_JJ mortality_NN ._. At_IN the_AT nadir_NN of_IN that_DT circuit_NN is_BEZ death_NN ._. ``_`` Along_RB with_IN the_AT fruit_NN they_PPSS did_DOD also_RB fall_VB under_IN the_AT power_NN of_IN death_NN ,_, because_CS they_PPSS did_DOD eat_VB in_RP disobedience_^ ;_. ;_. and_CC disobedience_^ to_TO God_NP entails_VBZ death_NN ._. Wherefore_WRB ,_, as_CS they_PPSS became_VBD forfeit_VB to_IN death_NN ,_, from_IN that_WPO (_( moment_NN )_) they_PPSS were_BED handed_VBN over_RP to_IN it_PPO ''_'' ._. This_DT leads_VBZ Irenaeus_NN to_IN the_AT somewhat_QL startling_JJ notion_NN that_CS Adam_NP and_CC Eve_NP died_VBD on_IN the_AT same_AP day_NN that_CS they_PPSS disobeyed_VBN ,_, namely_RB ,_, on_IN a_AT Friday_NR ,_, as_CS a_AT parallel_NN to_IN the_AT death_NN of_IN Christ_NP on_IN Good_JJ Friday_NR ;_. ;_. he_PPS sees_VBZ a_AT parallel_JJ also_RB to_TO the_AT Jewish_JJ day_NN of_IN preparation_NN for_IN the_AT Sabbath_^ ._. The_AT wages_NNS of_IN sin_NN is_BEZ death_NN ._. Man's_NN$ life_NN ,_, originally_RB shaped_VBN for_IN immortality_NN and_CC for_IN communion_NN with_IN God_NP ,_, must_MD now_RB be_BE conformed_VBN to_IN the_AT shape_NN of_IN death_NN ._. Nevertheless_RB ,_, even_RB at_IN the_AT nadir_NN of_IN the_AT circuit_NN the_AT spiral_NN of_IN history_NN belongs_VBZ to_IN God_NP ,_, and_CC he_PPS still_RB rules_NNS ._. Even_RB death_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, has_HVZ a_AT providential_NN as_CS well_RB as_CS a_AT punitive_JJ function_NN ._. ``_`` Wherefore_WRB also_RB He_PPS (_( God_NP )_) drove_VBD him_PPO (_( man_NN )_) out_RP of_IN Paradise_NN ,_, and_CC removed_VBD him_PPO far_RB from_IN the_AT tree_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, not_* because_CS He_PPS envied_VBD him_PPO the_AT tree_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, as_CS some_DTI venture_NN to_TO assert_VB ,_, but_CC because_CS He_PPS pitied_VBD him_PPO ,_, (_( and_CC did_DOD not_* desire_VB )_) that_CS he_PPS should_MD continue_VB a_AT sinner_NN for_IN ever_RB ,_, nor_CC that_CS the_AT sin_NN which_WDT surrounded_VBD him_PPO should_MD be_BE immortal_JJ ,_, and_CC evil_JJ interminable_JJ and_CC irremediable_JJ ._. But_CC He_PPS set_VBD a_AT bound_VBN to_IN his_PP$ (_( state_NN of_IN )_) sin_NN ,_, by_IN interposing_AT death_NN ,_, and_CC thus_RB causing_VBG sin_NN to_TO cease_VB ,_, putting_VBG an_AT end_NN to_IN it_PPO by_IN the_AT dissolution_NN of_IN the_AT flesh_NN ,_, which_WDT should_MD take_VB place_NN in_IN the_AT earth_NN ,_, so_CS that_DT man_NN ,_, ceasing_VBG at_IN length_NN to_TO live_VB in_IN sin_NN ,_, and_CC dying_NN to_IN it_PPO ,_, might_MD live_VB to_IN God_NP ''_'' ._. This_DT idea_NN ,_, which_WDT occurs_VBZ in_IN both_ABX Tatian_NNS and_CC Cyprian_NN ,_, fits_VBZ especially_QL well_RB into_IN the_AT scheme_NN of_IN Irenaeus'_AT theology_NN ;_. ;_. for_IN it_PPS prepares_VBZ the_AT way_NN for_IN the_AT passage_NN from_IN life_NN through_IN death_NN to_TO life_NN that_CS is_BEZ achieved_VBN in_IN Christ_NP ._. As_CS man_NN can_MD live_VB only_RB by_IN dying_VBG ,_, so_CS it_PPS was_BEDZ only_RB by_IN his_PP$ dying_VBG that_CS Christ_NP could_MD bring_VB many_AP to_IN life_NN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ probably_RB fair_JJ to_TO say_VB that_CS the_AT idea_NN of_IN death_NN is_BEZ more_QL profound_JJ in_IN Irenaeus_NN than_IN the_AT idea_NN of_IN sin_NN is_BEZ ._. This_DT applies_VBZ to_IN his_PP$ picture_NN of_IN Adam_NP ._. It_PPS is_BEZ borne_VBN out_RP also_RB by_IN the_AT absence_NN of_IN any_DTI developed_VBN theory_NN about_IN how_WRB sin_NN passes_VBZ from_IN one_CD generation_NN to_IN the_AT next_RB ._. It_PPS becomes_VBZ most_QL evident_JJ in_IN his_PP$ description_NN of_IN Christ_NP as_CS the_AT second_OD Adam_NP ,_, who_WPS does_DOZ indeed_QLP come_VBN to_TO destroy_VB sin_NN ,_, but_CC whose_WP$ work_NN culminates_VBZ in_IN the_AT achievement_NN of_IN immortality_NN ._. This_DT emphasis_NN upon_IN death_NN rather_RB than_CS sin_NN as_CS man's_NN$ fundamental_JJ problem_NN Irenaeus_IN shares_NNS with_IN many_AP early_JJ theologians_NNS ,_, especially_RB the_AT Greek-speaking_JJ ones_NNS ._. They_PPSS speak_VB of_IN the_AT work_NN of_IN Christ_NP as_CS the_AT bestowal_NN of_IN incorruptibility_NN ,_, which_WDT can_MD mean_VB (_( though_CS it_PPS does_DOZ not_* have_HV to_TO mean_VB )_) deliverance_NN from_IN time_NN and_CC history_NN ._. Death_NN reminds_VBZ man_NN of_IN his_PP$ sin_NN ,_, but_CC it_PPS reminds_VBZ him_PPO also_RB of_IN his_PP$ transience_^ ._. (_( Romans_NPS 31_CD ,_, 32_CD ,_, 35_CD )_) Salvation_NN !_. This_DT is_BEZ the_AT key_NN to_IN the_AT conquest_NN of_IN fear_VB ._. Yen_^ ._. According_IN to_IN this_DT doctrine_NN ,_, the_AT universe_NN was_BEDZ ruled_VBN by_IN Heaven_NN ,_, T'ien_NN --_-- as_CS a_AT natural_JJ force_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN the_AT personification_NN of_IN a_AT Supreme_JJ Sky-god_NN --_-- governing_VBG all_ABN things_NNS by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_AT process_NN called_VBD the_AT Tao_NN ,_, which_WDT can_MD be_BE roughly_RB interpreted_VBN as_CS ``_`` the_AT Order_NN of_IN the_AT Universe_NN ''_'' or_CC ``_`` the_AT Universal_JJ Way_NN ''_'' ._. Heaven_NN ,_, acting_VBG through_IN the_AT Tao_NN ,_, expressed_VBD itself_PPL by_IN means_NNS of_IN the_AT workings_NNS of_IN two_CD basic_JJ principles_NNS ,_, the_AT Yin_NN and_CC the_AT Yang_^ ._. The_AT Yang_NN ,_, or_CC male_JJ principle_NN ,_, was_BEDZ the_AT source_NN of_IN light_NN ,_, heat_NN ,_, and_CC dynamic_JJ vitality_NN ,_, associated_VBN with_IN the_AT Sun_NN ;_. ;_. while_CS the_AT Yin_^ ,_, or_CC female_NN principle_NN ,_, flourished_VBD in_IN darkness_NN ,_, cold_JJ ,_, and_CC quiet_NN inactivity_^ ,_, and_CC was_BEDZ associated_VBN with_IN the_AT Moon_NN ._. Together_RB these_DTS two_CD principles_NNS influenced_VBN all_ABN things_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN varying_VBG combinations_NNS they_PPSS were_BED present_JJ in_IN everything_PN ._. We_PPSS have_HV already_RB seen_VBN that_CS odd_JJ numbers_NNS were_BED considered_VBN as_CS being_BEG Yang_VBN ,_, while_CS the_AT even_JJ numbers_NNS were_BED Yin_VBN ,_, so_CS that_CS the_AT eight_CD outer_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN the_AT Lo_NN Shu_BEZ represented_VBN these_DTS two_CD principles_NNS in_IN balanced_VBN equilibrium_NN around_IN the_AT axial_JJ center_NN ._. Instead_RB of_IN linking_VBG the_AT nine_CD numbers_NNS of_IN this_DT diagram_NN with_IN the_AT traditional_JJ Nine_CD Provinces_NNS ,_, as_CS was_BEDZ usually_RB done_VBN ,_, this_DT equated_VBD the_AT odd_JJ ,_, Yang_CC numbers_NNS with_IN mountains_NNS (_( firm_JJ and_CC resistant_JJ ,_, hence_RB Yang_CD )_) and_CC the_AT even_JJ numbers_NNS with_IN rivers_NNS (_( sinuous_JJ and_CC yielding_NN ,_, hence_RB Yin_CD )_) ;_. ;_. taking_VBG the_AT former_AP from_IN the_AT Five_CD Sacred_^ Mountains_NNS of_IN the_AT Han_^ period_NN and_CC the_AT latter_AP from_IN the_AT principal_JJS river_NN systems_NNS of_IN Old_JJ China_NP ._. Thus_RB the_AT middle_JJ number_NN ,_, 5_CD ,_, represented_VBN Sung-Shan_NN in_IN Honan_NP ,_, Central_JJ China_NP ;_. ;_. the_AT 3_CD ,_, T'ai-Shan_^ in_IN Shantung_^ ,_, East_JJ China_NP ;_. ;_. the_AT 7_CD ,_, Hwa-Shan_^ in_IN Shensi_^ ,_, West_JJ China_NP ;_. ;_. the_AT 1_CD ,_, Heng-Shan_^ in_IN Hopei_^ ,_, North_NR China_NP (_( or_CC the_AT mountain_NN with_IN the_AT same_AP name_NN in_IN neighboring_VBG Shansi_^ )_) ;_. ;_. and_CC the_AT 9_CD ,_, Huo-Shan_^ in_IN Anhwei_^ ,_, which_WDT was_BEDZ then_RB the_AT South_NR Sacred_^ Mountain_NN ._. For_IN the_AT rivers_NNS ,_, the_AT 4_CD represented_VBD the_AT Huai_NN ,_, to_IN the_AT (_( then_RB )_) Southeast_JJ ;_. ;_. the_AT 2_CD ,_, the_AT San_NP Kiang_^ (_( three_CD rivers_NNS )_) in_IN the_AT (_( then_RB )_) Southwest_NR ;_. ;_. the_AT 8_CD ,_, the_AT Chi_^ in_IN the_AT Northeast_NR ;_. ;_. and_CC the_AT 6_CD ,_, the_AT (_( upper_JJ )_) Yellow_JJ River_NN in_IN the_AT Northwest_JJ ._. Note_VB that_CS by_IN Western_JJ standards_NNS this_DT plan_NN was_BEDZ ``_`` upside_RB down_RP ''_'' ,_, as_CS it_PPS put_VBD North_NR at_IN the_AT bottom_NN and_CC South_NR at_IN the_AT top_NN ,_, with_IN the_AT other_AP directions_NNS correspondingly_RB altered_VBN ;_. ;_. but_CC in_IN this_DT respect_NN it_PPS was_BEDZ merely_RB following_VBG the_AT accepted_VBN Chinese_JJ convention_NN for_IN all_ABN maps_NNS ._. The_AT same_AP arrangement_NN was_BEDZ used_VBN when_WRB the_AT Lo_JJ Shu_NN was_BEDZ equated_VBN with_IN the_AT Nine_CD Provinces_NNS ;_. ;_. and_CC whenever_WRB the_AT Lo_^ Shu_^ involved_VBN directional_JJ symbolism_NN ,_, it_PPS was_BEDZ oriented_VBN in_IN this_DT same_AP fashion_NN ._. Few_AP persons_NNS who_WPS join_VB the_AT Church_NN are_BER insincere_^ ._. They_PPSS earnestly_RB desire_VB to_TO do_DO the_AT will_NN of_IN God_NP ._. When_WRB they_PPSS fall_VB by_IN the_AT wayside_NN and_CC fail_VB to_TO achieve_VB Christian_JJ stature_NN ,_, it_PPS is_BEZ an_AT indictment_NN of_IN the_AT Church_NN ._. These_DTS fatalities_NNS are_BER dramatic_JJ evidence_NN of_IN ``_`` halfway_JJ evangelism_NN ''_'' ,_, a_AT failure_NN to_TO follow_VB through_IN ._. A_AT program_NN of_IN Lay_VB Visitation_AT Evangelism_NN can_MD end_VB in_IN dismal_JJ defeat_NN with_IN half_ABN the_AT new_JJ members_NNS drifting_VBG away_RB unless_CS practical_JJ plans_NNS and_CC strenuous_JJ efforts_NNS are_BER made_VBN to_TO keep_VB them_PPO in_IN the_AT active_NN fellowship_NN ._. The_AT pastor_NN and_CC the_AT Membership_NN Preparation_NN and_CC Assimilation_AT Committee_NN must_MD follow_VB through_RP immediately_RB with_IN a_AT carefully_RB planned_VBN program_NN ._. There_EX is_BEZ A_AT growing_VBG conviction_NN among_IN pastors_NNS and_CC Church_NN leaders_NNS that_CS all_ABN those_DTS who_WPS come_VB into_IN the_AT fellowship_NN of_IN the_AT Church_NN need_VB preparatory_JJ training_NN ,_, including_IN those_DTS coming_VBG by_IN transfer_NN of_IN membership_NN ._. George_NP E._NP Sweazey_NP writes_VBZ :_. ``_`` There_EX is_BEZ danger_NN in_IN trying_VBG to_TO make_VB admission_NN to_TO the_AT Church_NN so_CS easy_JJ and_CC painless_JJ that_CS people_NNS will_MD scarcely_RB know_VB that_CS anything_PN has_HVZ happened_VBD ''_'' ._. Those_DTS coming_VBG from_IN other_AP denominations_NNS will_MD welcome_VB the_AT opportunity_NN to_TO become_VB informed_VBN ._. Every_AT detail_NN of_IN the_AT service_NN merits_VBZ careful_JJ attention_NN --_-- the_AT hymns_NNS ,_, the_AT sermon_NN ,_, the_AT ritual_NN ,_, the_AT right_JJ hand_NN of_IN fellowship_NN ,_, the_AT introduction_NN to_IN the_AT congregation_NN ,_, the_AT welcome_NN of_IN the_AT congregation_NN ._. Chapter_NN 6_CD planning_NN for_IN the_AT assimilation_NN and_CC growth_NN of_IN new_JJ members_NNS the_AT church_NN is_BEZ ``_`` the_AT family_NN of_IN God_NP ''_'' ._. The_AT members_NNS of_IN the_AT ``_`` family_NN ''_'' are_BER drawn_VBN together_RB by_IN a_AT common_JJ love_NN for_IN Christ_NP and_CC a_AT sincere_JJ devotion_NN to_IN His_PP$ Kingdom_NN ._. Yet_CC the_AT most_QL difficult_JJ problem_NN in_IN the_AT Church's_NN$ program_NN of_IN evangelism_NN is_BEZ right_RB at_IN this_DT point_NN --_---HL helping_VBG new_JJ members_NNS to_TO become_VB participating_VBG ,_, growing_VBG parts_NNS of_IN the_AT fellowship_NN ._. Very_QL easily_RB they_PPSS may_MD be_BE neglected_VBN and_CC eventually_RB join_VB the_AT ranks_NNS of_IN the_AT unconcerned_JJ and_CC inactive_JJ ._. A_AT study_NN of_IN major_JJ denominational_JJ membership_NN statistics_NNS over_IN a_AT twenty-year_JJ period_NN revealed_VBD the_AT appalling_JJ fact_NN that_WPS nearly_RB 40_CD per_IN cent_NN of_IN those_DTS who_WPS joined_VBD the_AT Church_NN were_BED lost_VBN to_IN the_AT Church_NN within_IN seven_CD years_NNS ._. One_CD denomination_NN had_HVD a_AT membership_NN of_IN 1,419,833_NN at_IN the_AT beginning_NN of_IN the_AT period_NN under_IN study_NN ,_, and_CC twenty_CD years_NNS later_RBR its_PP$ membership_NN stood_VBD at_IN 1,541,991_NN --_-- a_AT net_JJ growth_NN of_IN only_AP 122,158_^ ._. Yet_RB during_IN the_AT same_AP period_NN there_EX were_BED 1,080,062_JJ additions_NNS ._. Another_DT major_JJ church_NN body_NN had_HVD 4,499,608_VBN members_NNS and_CC twenty_CD years_NNS later_RBR its_PP$ membership_NN stood_VBD at_IN 4,622,444_AT ._. During_IN this_DT time_NN 4,122,354_IN new_JJ members_NNS were_BED brought_VBN into_IN the_AT fellowship_NN ._. Still_RB another_DT denomination_NN had_HVD 7,360,187_VBN members_NNS twenty_CD years_NNS ago_RB ._. During_IN this_DT period_NN 7,484,268_IN members_NNS were_BED received_VBN ,_, yet_CC the_AT net_JJ membership_NN now_RB is_BEZ only_RB 9,910,741_. ._. These_DTS figures_NNS indicate_VB that_CS we_PPSS are_BER losing_VBG almost_RB as_CS many_AP as_CS we_PPSS are_BER receiving_VBG into_IN membership_NN ._. This_DT problem_NN is_BEZ illustrated_VBN by_IN the_AT fact_NN that_CS many_AP local_JJ churches_NNS drop_VB from_IN the_AT active_JJ membership_NN rolls_VBZ each_DT year_NN as_CS many_AP as_CS they_PPSS receive_VB into_IN the_AT fellowship_NN ._. Studies_NNS of_IN membership_NN trends_NNS ,_, even_RB in_IN some_DTI areas_NNS where_WRB population_NN is_BEZ expanding_VBG ,_, show_VB that_CS numbers_NNS of_IN churches_NNS have_HV had_HVN little_AP net_JJ increase_NN ,_, though_CS many_AP new_JJ members_NNS were_BED received_VBN ._. Something_PN is_BEZ wrong_JJ when_WRB these_DTS things_NNS happen_VB ._. The_AT local_JJ ``_`` family_NN of_IN God_NP ''_'' has_HVZ failed_VBN its_PP$ new_JJ members_NNS through_IN neglect_NN and_CC unconcern_NN for_IN their_PP$ spiritual_JJ welfare_NN ._. Basic_JJ needs_NNS new_JJ members_NNS can_MD become_VB participating_VBG ,_, growing_VBG members_NNS ._. But_CC this_DT will_MD not_* happen_VB merely_RB through_IN the_AT natural_JJ process_NN of_IN social_JJ life_NN ._. It_PPS must_MD be_BE planned_VBN and_CC carefully_RB developed_VBN ._. The_AT entire_JJ membership_NN of_IN the_AT local_JJ church_NN must_MD be_BE alerted_VBN to_IN their_PP$ part_NN in_IN this_DT dynamic_JJ process_NN ._. If_CS the_AT church_NN has_HVZ followed_VBN the_AT plan_NN of_IN cultivation_NN of_IN prospects_NNS and_CC carried_VBD through_IN a_AT program_NN of_IN membership_NN preparation_NN as_CS outlined_VBN earlier_RBR in_IN this_DT book_NN ,_, the_AT process_NN of_IN assimilation_NN and_CC growth_NN will_MD be_BE well_RB under_IN way_NN ._. Those_DTS who_WPS enter_VB the_AT front_JJ door_NN of_IN the_AT church_NN intelligently_, and_CC with_IN Christian_JJ dedication_NN will_MD not_* so_QL easily_RB step_NN through_IN the_AT back_NN door_NN because_CS of_IN lost_VBN interest_NN ._. In_IN China_NP ,_, the_AT magical_JJ system_NN par_IN excellence_NN was_BEDZ Taoism_NP ._. What_WDT may_MD be_BE acceptable_JJ in_IN one_CD state_NN may_MD be_BE strictly_QL prohibited_VBN across_IN the_AT boundary_NN line_NN ._.
