If_CS your_PP$ state_NN has_HVZ no_AT provisions_NNS for_IN the_AT numbering_VBG of_IN pleasure_NN boats_NNS ,_, you_PPSS must_MD apply_VB for_IN a_AT number_NN from_IN the_AT U.S._NP Coast_NN Guard_NN for_IN any_DTI kind_NN of_IN boat_NN with_IN mechanical_JJ propulsion_NN rated_VBN at_IN more_AP than_CS 10_CD horsepower_NN before_CS it_PPS can_MD be_BE used_VBN on_IN Federal_JJ waterways_NNS ._. State_NN numbering_VBG laws_NNS differ_VB from_IN each_DT other_AP in_IN many_AP ways_NNS ._. Fees_NNS are_BER not_* the_AT same_AP and_CC some_DTI states_NNS do_DO not_* require_VB certain_JJ craft_NN ,_, such_JJ as_CS sailboats_AT with_IN no_AT power_NN ,_, to_TO be_BE registered_VBN at_IN all_ABN ._. Many_AP states_NNS have_HV laws_NNS regulating_IN the_AT use_NN of_IN boat_NN trailers_NNS and_CC some_DTI have_HV restrictions_NNS regarding_IN the_AT age_NN of_IN motor_NN boat_NN operators_NNS ._. Generally_RB ,_, states_NNS reserve_VB for_IN communities_NNS the_AT right_JJ to_TO have_HV local_JJ ordinances_NNS regulating_IN speed_NN and_CC other_AP activities_NNS ._. It_PPS is_BEZ always_RB wise_JJ to_TO consult_VB your_PP$ marine_NN dealer_NN ,_, local_JJ yacht_NN or_CC boat_NN club_NN secretary_NN ,_, or_CC local_JJ law_NN enforcement_NN officers_NNS if_CS you_PPSS are_BER not_* positive_JJ what_WDT the_AT regulations_NNS are_BER ._. Ignorance_NN of_IN the_AT law_NN is_BEZ no_QL better_JJR excuse_NN on_IN the_AT water_NN than_CS it_PPS is_BEZ on_IN land_NN ;_. ;_. lack_NN of_IN ability_NN and_CC common_JJ sense_NN can_MD lead_VB to_TO just_RB as_CS much_QL tragedy_NN ._. Hand_NN in_IN hand_NN with_IN the_AT legislative_JJ program_NN is_BEZ the_AT industry's_NN$ self_NN originated_VBD and_CC directed_VBN safety_NN program_NN ._. Foreseeing_IN the_AT possible_JJ threats_NNS to_IN safety_NN with_IN the_AT rapid_JJ growth_NN of_IN the_AT sport_NN ,_, the_AT industry_NN has_HVZ been_BEN supporting_VBG an_AT intense_JJ ,_, coordinated_VBN educational_JJ program_NN with_IN great_JJ success_NN since_IN 1947_CD ._. A_AT primary_JJ factor_NN in_IN the_AT success_NN of_IN the_AT safety_NN program_NN has_HVZ been_BEN the_AT enthusiastic_JJ cooperation_NN of_IN the_AT individual_JJ manufacturers_NNS ._. The_AT industry_NN has_HVZ been_BEN its_PP$ own_JJ watch_NN dog_NN ._. With_IN U.S._NP Coast_NN Guard_NN cooperation_NN ,_, the_AT American_JJ Boat_NN and_CC Yacht_AT Council_NN was_BEDZ formed_VBN to_TO develop_VB recommended_VBN practices_NNS and_CC standards_NNS for_IN boats_NNS and_CC their_PP$ equipment_NN with_IN reference_NN to_IN safety_NN ._. Industry_NN interest_NN in_IN safety_NN goes_VBZ even_RB farther_QL ._. In_IN 1959_CD ,_, the_AT Yacht_JJ Safety_NN Bureau_NN was_BEDZ reorganized_VBN by_IN the_AT National_JJ Association_NN of_IN Engine_NN and_CC Boat_NP Manufacturers_NNS and_CC a_AT group_NN of_IN insurance_NN underwriters_NN to_TO provide_VB a_AT testing_NN laboratory_NN and_CC labeling_VBG service_NN for_IN boats_NNS and_CC their_PP$ equipment_NN ._. A_AT new_JJ waterfront_NN site_NN for_IN the_AT bureau_NN is_BEZ now_RB being_BEG built_VBN at_IN Atlantic_JJ City_NN ,_, New_JJ Jersey_NP ,_, to_TO provide_VB the_AT most_QL modern_JJ marine_NN testing_VBG facilities_NNS as_CS a_AT further_JJR tool_NN to_IN keep_VB the_AT sport_NN safe_JJ ._. In_IN addition_NN to_IN these_DTS activities_NNS ,_, the_AT NAEBM_NN ,_, with_IN headquarters_NN at_IN 420_AT Lexington_NP Avenue_NN ,_, New_JJ York_NP City_NN ,_, as_QL well_RB as_CS other_AP associations_NNS and_CC individual_JJ manufacturers_NNS ,_, provide_VB and_CC distribute_VB films_NNS ,_, booklets_NNS ,_, and_CC public_JJ services_NNS in_IN regard_NN to_IN proper_JJ boat_NN handling_NN and_CC safety_NN afloat_^ ._. It_PPS is_BEZ important_JJ to_TO note_VB the_AT work_NN of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS Power_NN Squadrons_, and_CC the_AT U.S._NP Coast_NN Guard_NN Auxiliary_^ ._. Each_DT of_IN these_DTS fine_JJ groups_NNS gives_VBZ free_JJ boating_VBG classes_NNS in_IN seamanship_AT piloting_NN and_CC small_JJ boat_NN handling_VBG ._. These_DTS are_BER not_* governmentally_BE subsidized_VBN organizations_NNS ._. This_DT year_NN ,_, over_IN 100,000_CD persons_NNS will_MD receive_VB this_DT free_JJ instruction_NN ._. As_CS America_NP on_IN wheels_NNS was_BEDZ responsible_JJ for_IN an_AT industry_NN of_IN motor_NN courts_NNS ,_, motels_NP ,_, and_CC drive-in_NN establishments_NNS where_WRB you_PPSS can_MD dine_VB ,_, see_VB a_AT movie_NN ,_, shop_NN ,_, or_CC make_VB a_AT bank_NN deposit_NN ,_, the_AT ever-increasing_JJ number_NN of_IN boating_VBG enthusiasts_NNS have_HV sparked_VBN industries_NNS designed_VBN especially_RB to_TO accommodate_VB them_PPO ._. Instead_RB of_IN motels_NN ,_, for_IN the_AT boatman_NN there_EX are_BER marinas_^ ._. The_AT word_NN marina_NN was_BEDZ coined_VBN by_IN NAEBM_NN originally_RB to_TO describe_VB a_AT waterfront_NN facility_NN where_WRB recreational_JJ boats_NNS could_MD find_VB protection_NN and_CC basic_JJ needs_NNS to_TO lay_VB over_RP in_IN relative_JJ comfort_NN ._. Currently_RB ,_, marina_NN is_BEZ used_VBN to_TO indicate_VB a_AT municipal_JJ or_CC commercially_RB operated_VBN facility_NN where_WRB a_AT pleasure_NN boat_NN may_MD dock_NN and_CC find_VB some_DTI or_CC all_ABN of_IN the_AT following_VBG available_JJ :_. gasoline_NN ,_, fresh_JJ water_NN ,_, electricity_NN ,_, telephone_VB service_NN ,_, ice_NN ,_, repair_NN facilities_NNS ,_, restaurants_NNS ,_, sleeping_VBG accommodations_NNS ,_, a_AT general_JJ store_NN ,_, and_CC a_AT grocery_NN store_NN ._. Yachtel_RB ,_, a_AT relatively_QL new_JJ word_NN ,_, indicates_VBZ a_AT waterfront_NN type_NN of_IN hotel_NN where_WRB a_AT yachtsman_NN may_MD dock_NN and_CC find_VB overnight_JJ accommodations_NNS on_IN the_AT premises_NNS as_QL well_RB as_CS other_AP services_NNS ._. Boatel_PPS has_HVZ a_AT similar_JJ meaning_NN to_TO yachtel_^ ._. It_PPS indicates_VBZ the_AT same_AP thing_NN but_CC it_PPS is_BEZ meant_VBN to_TO pertain_VB more_QL specifically_RB to_IN establishments_NNS designed_VBN to_TO cater_VB to_IN smaller_JJR type_NN boats_NNS such_JJ as_CS outboards_^ ._. Regardless_RB of_IN nomenclature_NN ,_, yachtels_NP and_CC boatels_NNS are_BER marinas_^ ._. Boatyards_`` which_WDT also_RB provide_VB some_DTI of_IN the_AT above_JJ facilities_NNS may_MD rightfully_* be_BE called_VBN marinas_^ ._. A_AT recent_JJ survey_NN disclosed_VBD there_EX are_BER about_RB 4,000_CD commercially_RB and_CC municipally_PPS operated_VBD marinas_, and_CC boatyards_VBD in_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS ,_, the_AT majority_NN of_IN which_WDT are_BER equipped_VBN to_TO handle_VB outboard_JJ boats_NNS ._. The_AT design_NN of_IN a_AT mechanical_JJ interlocking_VBG frame_NN is_BEZ much_RB like_CS a_AT mechanical_JJ puzzle_NN ,_, but_CC once_RB understood_VBN ,_, the_AT principles_NNS can_MD be_BE applied_VBN to_IN any_DTI track_NN and_CC signal_NN arrangement_NN ._. In_IN the_AT frame_NN are_BER two_CD sets_NNS of_IN bars_NNS which_WDT interact_VB with_IN each_DT other_AP to_TO prevent_VB the_AT operator_NN from_IN making_VBG dangerous_JJ moves_VBZ ._. The_AT main_JJS set_NN of_IN bars_NNS are_BER the_AT ``_`` tappets_NNS ''_'' and_CC one_CD tappet_NN is_BEZ connected_VBN to_TO each_DT lever_NN ._. If_CS the_AT lever_NN is_BEZ pulled_VBN to_TO clear_VB a_AT signal_NN or_CC move_VB a_AT switch_NN ,_, the_AT tappet_NN moves_VBZ a_AT short_JJ distance_NN lengthwise_RB at_IN the_AT same_AP time_NN ._. Close_RB behind_IN the_AT plane_NN of_IN the_AT tappets_NNS are_BER the_AT locking_VBG bars_NNS ._. These_DTS can_MD also_RB move_VB a_AT short_JJ distance_NN but_CC at_IN right_JJ angles_NNS to_IN the_AT tappets_NNS ._. The_AT number_NN of_IN locking_VBG bars_NNS required_VBN depends_VBZ on_IN how_WQL many_AP false_JJ moves_NNS must_MD be_BE prevented_VBD ._. In_IN the_AT sides_NNS of_IN the_AT tappets_NNS are_BER notches_NNS with_IN sloping_VBG sides_NNS ,_, and_CC connection_NN between_IN the_AT tappets_NNS and_CC locking_VBG bars_NNS consist_VB of_IN cams_AT called_VBN ``_`` dogs_NNS ''_'' ._. Two_CD or_CC more_AP dogs_NNS are_BER mounted_VBN on_IN each_DT locking_VBG bar_NN ._. These_DTS slide_NN into_IN and_CC out_RP of_IN the_AT notches_NNS in_IN the_AT tappets_NNS as_CS the_AT tappets_NNS are_BER moved_VBN ,_, locking_VBG and_CC unlocking_VBD them_PPO ._. Here's_RB+BEZ how_WRB the_AT scheme_NN works_NNS :_. Suppose_VB the_AT operator_NN pulls_VBZ the_AT lever_NN to_TO clear_JJ a_AT particular_JJ signal_NN ._. This_DT also_RB pulls_VBZ the_AT tappet_NN connected_VBN to_IN the_AT particular_JJ lever_NN and_CC forces_NNS any_DTI dogs_NNS seated_VBN in_IN the_AT notches_NNS to_IN the_AT side_NN ,_, thus_RB moving_VBG one_CD or_CC more_AP locking_VBG bars_NNS ._. The_AT dogs_NNS on_IN the_AT other_AP ends_NNS of_IN these_DTS locking_VBG bars_NNS are_BER thus_RB forced_VBN into_IN notches_NNS in_IN other_AP tappets_NNS ._. By_IN this_DT scheme_NN ,_, pulling_VBG one_CD signal_NN to_IN clear_JJ locks_NNS all_ABN the_AT other_AP switch_NN and_CC signal_NN levers_NN in_IN safe_JJ positions_NNS until_IN the_AT first_OD signal_NN is_BEZ again_RB restored_VBN to_IN normal_JJ ._. Interlocking_AT signals_NNS are_BER normally_RB at_IN stop_NN or_CC ``_`` red_JJ ''_'' position_NN ,_, and_CC a_AT lever_NN must_MD be_BE pulled_VBN to_TO ``_`` clear_JJ ''_'' the_AT signal_NN ._. This_DT is_BEZ not_* necessarily_RB to_IN green_JJ ,_, however_RB ,_, for_IN in_IN some_DTI situations_NNS only_RB a_AT yellow_JJ indication_NN is_BEZ given_VBN to_IN a_AT train_NN to_TO let_VB it_PPO into_IN the_AT ``_`` plant_NN ''_'' ._. There_EX are_BER other_AP basic_JJ rules_NNS ._. A_AT turnout_NN may_MD have_HV two_CD levers_NNS ,_, one_CD to_IN actually_RB move_VB the_AT switch_NN points_NNS ,_, the_AT other_AP to_TO lock_VB the_AT points_VBZ ._. A_AT signal_NN cannot_MD* be_BE cleared_VBN until_CS all_ABN the_AT related_VBN turnouts_NNS are_BER properly_RB thrown_VBN and_CC locked_VBD ._. Such_JJ locks_NNS are_BER nearly_QL always_RB used_VBN where_WRB the_AT switch_NN points_VBZ ``_`` face_NN ''_'' oncoming_. traffic_NN ._. The_AT lock_NN insures_, that_CS the_AT points_NNS are_BER thrown_VBN all_ABN the_AT way_NN with_IN no_AT chance_NN that_CS a_AT wheel_NN flange_NN will_MD snag_VB on_IN a_AT partly_QL thrown_VBN point_NN ._. If_CS the_AT points_NNS aren't_BER* thrown_VBN all_ABN the_AT way_NN ,_, the_AT Turnout_NN cannot_MD* be_BE locked_VBN ,_, and_CC in_IN turn_NN ,_, the_AT signal_NN cannot_MD* be_BE cleared_VBN ._. Generally_RB ,_, these_DTS locks_NNS on_IN turnouts_NNS are_BER called_VBN ``_`` facing_VBG point_NN locks_NNS ''_'' ._. Figs._NNS 1-6_TO show_VB typical_JJ arrangements_NNS of_IN track_NN and_CC signals_NNS ._. Each_DT diagram_NN is_BEZ accompanied_VBN by_IN a_AT ``_`` dog_NN chart_NN ''_'' ,_, a_AT list_NN of_IN the_AT levers_NN that_WPS show_VB which_WDT other_AP levers_IN any_DTI particular_JJ lever_NN will_MD lock_VB if_CS pulled_VBN ._. The_AT lines_NNS connecting_VBG the_AT wedge-shaped_JJ dogs_NNS represent_VB the_AT locking_VBG bars_NNS at_IN right_JJ angles_NNS to_IN the_AT tappet_NN bars_NNS ._. By_IN studying_VBG the_AT track-signal_JJ diagrams_NNS you'll_PPSS+MD note_VB several_AP other_AP details_NNS ._. Derails_RB --_-- mechanical_JJ track_NN devices_NNS that_WPS actually_RB guide_VB the_AT wheels_NNS off_IN the_AT rails_NNS if_CS a_AT train_NN passes_VBZ a_AT ``_`` stop_VB ''_'' signal_NN --_-- are_BER used_VBN in_IN many_AP instances_NNS ._. ``_`` Home_NN ''_'' signals_NNS have_HV two_CD blades_NNS ._. The_AT blacked-in_JJ blades_NNS indicate_VB a_AT fixed_VBN aspect_NN --_-- the_AT blade_NN does_DOZ not_* move_VB ._. As_CS an_AT engineer_NN approaches_VBZ the_AT plant_NN the_AT position_NN of_IN the_AT home_NR signal_NN is_BEZ seen_VBN in_IN advance_NN when_WRB he_PPS passes_VBZ the_AT ``_`` distant_JJ ''_'' signal_NN located_VBN beyond_IN the_AT limits_NNS of_IN the_AT interlocking_VBG plant_NN ._. In_IN some_DTI low-speed_JJ situations_NNS ,_, the_AT distant_JJ signal_NN is_BEZ fixed_VBN at_IN caution_NN ._. In_IN other_AP instances_NNS where_WRB there_EX is_BEZ no_AT automatic_JJ block_NN signaling_NN ,_, the_AT distant_JJ has_HVZ only_RB green_JJ and_CC yellow_JJ aspects_NNS ._. So_QL much_AP for_IN the_AT prototype_NN ._. The_AT interlocking_VBG frame_NN we_PPSS built_VBD at_IN the_AT model_NN railroader_IN workshop_NN and_CC then_RB installed_VBN on_IN Paul_NP Larson's_NP railroad_NN follows_VBZ the_AT Fig._NN 1_CD scheme_NN and_CC is_BEZ shown_VBN beginning_NN in_IN Fig._NN 7_CD ,_, page_NN 65_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN the_AT photos_NNS ._. Here's_RB+BEZ how_WRB it_PPS can_MD be_BE built_VBN ._. Frame_IN The_AT sizes_NNS of_IN pieces_NNS needed_VBN for_IN the_AT interlocking_VBG frame_NN are_BER shown_VBN in_IN the_AT notes_NNS within_IN Fig._NN 7_CD ,_, most_AP of_IN the_AT bars_NNS being_BEG 1/8''_NN ''_'' brass_NN in_IN 1/4''_NN ''_'' and_CC 1/2''_NN ''_'' widths_NNS ._. You_PPSS may_MD change_VB the_AT dimensions_NNS to_TO suit_VB a_AT frame_NN for_IN more_AP or_CC fewer_AP levers_NNS and_CC locks_NNS as_IN you_PPO wish_VB ._. Our_PP$ instructions_NNS assume_VB you_PPSS are_BER building_VBG this_DT particular_JJ frame_NN ,_, which_WDT is_BEZ for_IN a_AT junction_NN ._. When_WRB cutting_VBG the_AT pieces_NNS ,_, dress_VB the_AT ends_NNS smooth_JJ ,_, and_CC square_NN with_IN a_AT smooth_JJ file_NN or_CC sanding_VBG disk_NN ._. Start_VB with_IN the_AT right-hand_NN piece_NN ``_`` B_NP ''_'' ,_, Af_NN ,_, soldering_IN it_PPO to_IN the_AT lower_JJR piece_NN ``_`` A_NP ''_'' of_IN the_AT same_AP material_NN but_CC 12''_NN ''_'' long_JJ ._. Let_VB exactly_RB 1''_NN ''_'' of_IN ``_`` A_NP ''_'' extend_VB beyond_IN ``_`` B_NP ''_'' and_CC use_VB a_AT square_NN to_TO check_VB your_PP$ angle_NN to_IN exactly_RB 90_CD degrees_NNS ._. Now_RB lay_VBD 12_CD pieces_NNS of_IN Af_NN cut_VBD 5-3/4''_PPO ''_'' long_JJ side_NN by_IN side_NN but_CC separated_VBN by_IN 12_CD pieces_NNS of_IN the_AT same_AP material_NN 1/2''_NN ''_'' sq._^ ._. This_DT gives_VBZ you_PPO the_AT spacing_NN for_IN locating_VBG the_AT left-hand_NN piece_NN ``_`` B_NP ''_'' ._. Compress_IN the_AT assembly_NN when_WRB you_PPSS make_VB the_AT mark_NN to_TO show_VB the_AT location_NN for_IN ``_`` B_NP ''_'' ._. Solder_IN this_DT second_OD ``_`` B_NP ''_'' to_TO ``_`` A_NP ''_'' at_IN right_JJ angles_NNS ._. There_EX should_MD be_BE 10''_VBN ''_'' between_IN the_AT two_CD parallel_JJ members_NNS and_CC each_DT should_MD be_BE 1''_NN ''_'' from_IN an_AT end_NN of_IN the_AT long_JJ piece_NN ._. Cap_NP this_DT assembly_NN (_( with_IN spacing_NN bars_NNS in_IN place_NN )_) with_IN a_AT Af_NN bar_NN ._. Tack-solder_IN all_ABN the_AT 1/2''_NN ''_'' sq._, pieces_NNS to_IN the_AT 10''_NN ''_'' and_CC 12''_NN ''_'' members_NNS ._. These_DTS will_MD be_BE drilled_VBN and_CC tapped_VBD later_RBR on_IN ._. Now_RB cut_VB five_CD Af_NN locking_VBG bar_NN spacers_. (_( which_WDT run_VB horizontally_RB )_) ._. Position_NN these_DTS using_VBG six_CD intermediate_JJ temporary_JJ Af_NN spacers_, and_CC locate_VB the_AT upper_JJ 12''_NN ''_'' bar_NN ``_`` A_NP ''_'' ._. Solder_IN it_PPO and_CC the_AT five_CD locking_VBG bar_NN spacers_NN to_IN the_AT frame_NN ._. Now_RB place_VB 12_CD pieces_NNS 1/2''_NN ''_'' sq._, on_IN this_DT edge_NN as_CS we_PPSS did_DOD before_RB and_CC space_NN them_PPO with_IN the_AT 5-3/4''_NN ''_'' long_JJ ``_`` tappets_NNS ''_'' ,_, as_CS they_PPSS are_BER called_VBN ._. Cap_NP with_IN a_AT Af_NN bar_NN and_CC tack-solder_NN in_IN place_NN ._. Cap_NP the_AT locking_VBG bar_NN spacers_NN with_IN two_CD Af_NN directly_RB under_IN the_AT first_OD two_CD ``_`` B_NP ''_'' pieces_NNS ._. Remove_VB all_ABN the_AT loose_JJ spacing_NN bars_NNS ._. Mark_NP and_CC center-punch_IN all_ABN the_AT holes_NNS required_VBN for_IN screws_NNS to_TO hold_VB this_DT assembly_NN together_RB ._. See_VB Fig._NN 7_CD ._. Placement_NN of_IN these_DTS holes_NNS is_BEZ not_* critical_JJ ,_, but_CC they_PPSS should_MD be_BE located_VBN so_CS that_CS the_AT centers_NNS are_BER about_RB 1/8''_NN ''_'' from_IN any_DTI edge_NN ._. Drill_VB all_ABN No._NN 50_CD and_CC counter-drill_IN all_ABN except_IN the_AT ``_`` A_NP ''_'' pieces_NNS size_NN 43_CD ._. Tap_IN the_AT ``_`` A_NP ''_'' pieces_NNS 2-56_CD ._. Now_RB unsolder_, and_CC disassemble_IN the_AT frame_NN except_IN for_IN the_AT two_CD 12''_NNS ''_'' and_CC the_AT first_OD two_CD 3-3/4''_NNS ''_'' bars_NNS (_( ``_`` A_AT ''_'' and_CC ``_`` B_NP ''_'' pieces_NNS )_) ,_, which_WDT are_BER soldered_QL together_RB ._. Either_CC lay_VBD the_AT components_NNS aside_RB in_IN proper_JJ order_NN or_CC code_NN them_PPO with_IN numbers_NNS and_CC letters_NNS so_CS they_PPSS may_MD be_BE replaced_VBN in_IN their_PP$ proper_JJ positions_NNS ._. Drill_VB 20_CD No._NN 47_CD holes_NNS in_IN the_AT upper_JJ piece_NN ``_`` A_NP ''_'' as_CS shown_VBN in_IN Fig._NN 7_CD ._. Tap_IN these_DTS 3-48_NNS for_IN mounting_VBG the_AT electrical_JJ contact_NN later_RBR on_IN ._. Note_VB ,_, 6_CD and_CC 8_CD lock_NN levers_. don't_DO* require_VB holes_NNS for_IN contacts_NNS ._. Now_RB reassemble_VB the_AT frame_NN ,_, using_VBG Af_NN roundhead_NN steel_NN screws_NNS and_CC nuts_NNS ._. Put_VB the_AT 12_CD tappets_NNS and_CC some_DTI Af_NN locking_VBG bar_NN spacers_NN in_IN the_AT frame_NN to_TO help_VB align_VB all_ABN the_AT components_NNS before_CS you_PPSS tighten_VB the_AT screws_NNS ._. Be_BE sure_JJ the_AT tappets_NNS are_BER not_* pinched_VBN by_IN a_AT twisted_VBN 1/2''_NN ''_'' sq._. spacer_^ ._. As_CS an_AT anchor_NN for_IN the_AT spring_NN lock_NN ,_, insert_VB a_AT Af_NN bar_NN in_IN the_AT lower_JJR left_NR corner_NN of_IN the_AT frame_NN as_CS shown_VBN in_IN Fig._NN 7_CD ._. Drill_VB a_AT No._NN 43_CD hole_NN through_IN the_AT pieces_NNS and_CC secure_VB with_IN a_AT 2-56_CD nut_NN and_CC screw_NN ._. Drill_VB two_CD No._NN 50_CD holes_NNS ,_, one_CD in_IN the_AT insert_NN and_CC one_CD in_IN the_AT locking_VBG bar_NN spacer_, directly_RB above_IN it_PPO ,_, and_CC tap_VB 2-56_CD ._. Number_NN all_ABN the_AT tappet_NN bars_NNS before_IN removing_VBG them_PPO so_CS they_PPSS can_MD be_BE replaced_VBN in_IN the_AT same_AP slots_NNS ._. Remove_VB all_ABN other_AP loose_JJ pieces_NNS and_CC file_VB the_AT edges_NNS of_IN the_AT basic_JJ frame_NN smooth_JJ ._. Cut_VB five_CD pieces_NNS of_IN Af_NN brass_NN bar_NN stock_NN 3-3/4''_NN ''_'' long_JJ ._. These_DTS are_BER supporting_VBG members_NNS for_IN the_AT short_JJ locking_VBG bars_NNS ._. Locate_IN their_PP$ positions_NNS in_IN Fig._NN 7_CD and_CC drill_NN No._NN 43_CD to_TO match_VB the_AT corresponding_VBG holes_NNS in_IN the_AT frame_NN ._. Cut_VB off_RP excess_JJ screw_NN lengths_NNS and_CC file_NN flush_NN with_IN either_DTX frame_NN or_CC nut_NN ._. Drill_VB four_CD No._NN 19_CD and_CC four_CD No._NN 28_CD holes_NNS in_IN the_AT 12''_NN ''_'' long_JJ ``_`` A_NP ''_'' pieces_NNS ._. Locate_IN the_AT position_NN from_IN Fig._NN 7_CD ._. Tappets_NP and_CC locking_VBG bars_NNS Draw-file_VB No._NN 1_CD tappet_NN to_IN a_AT smooth_JJ fit_NN in_IN its_PP$ respective_JJ slot_NN and_CC square_VB the_AT ends_NNS ._. Break_IN the_AT end_NN corners_NNS with_IN a_AT slight_JJ 45_CD degree_NN chamfer_NN ._.
